original: saṃkīrṇo hyañjano yo 'sāvaupavāhyo yamasya saḥ // BndP_2,7.330 //
analyzed: saṃkīrṇaḥ hi añjanaḥ saḥ aupavāhyaḥ yamasya saḥ

original: bhadro yaḥ supratīkastu hastiḥ sa hyapāṃpateḥ /
analyzed: bhadraḥ yaḥ supratīkaḥ tu hastiḥ sa hi apāṃpateḥ

original: padmo mandastu yo gauro dvipo hyailavilasya ca // BndP_2,7.331 //
analyzed: padmaḥ mandaḥ tu yaḥ gauraḥ dvipaḥ hi ailavilasya ca

original: mṛgaśyāmastu yo hastī caupa vāhyaḥ sa pāvakeḥ /
analyzed: mṛga śyāmaḥ tu yaḥ hastī vāhyaḥ sa pāvakeḥ

original: padmottamaḥ padmāgulmo gajo vātagajo gajaḥ // BndP_2,7.332 //

analyzed: capalaḥ riṣṭasaṃjñaḥ ca tasya aṣṭau jajñire sutāḥ

original: udagrabhāveno petā jāyante tasya cānvaye // BndP_2,7.333 //
analyzed: udagra bhāvena u petāḥ jāyante tasya ca anvaye
śveta bāla nakhāḥ piṅgāḥ varṣāvantaḥ mataṅga jāḥ
sāma jān tu pravakṣyāmi nāgān anyān api kramāt
kapilaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ ca sunāmānau rathantarāt

original: jātau nāmnā śrutau tābhyāṃ supratīkapramardanau // BndP_2,7.335 //
analyzed: jātau nāmnā śrutau tābhyām supratīka pramardanau
śūrāḥ sthūla śiraḥ dantāḥ śuddha bāla nakhāḥ tathā
balinaḥ śaṅkitāḥ ca eva smṛtāḥ tad vaṃśinaḥ gajāḥ
puṣpa dantaḥ bṛhatsāmnaḥ ṣaṣ dantaḥ padma pucchavān
tāmra parṇaḥ ca tad putrāḥ saṃgha cāri viṣāṇinaḥ
anvaye ca asya jāyante laṃboṣṭhāḥ cāru darśanāḥ
śyāma tvac rasanā śuṇḍāḥ nāgāḥ pīna āyatāḥ nanāḥ
śyāmaḥ sāmnaḥ jajñe vāmanaḥ

original: bhāryā caivāṅganā tasya nīlavallakṣaṇau sutau // BndP_2,7.339 //
analyzed: bhāryā ca eva aṅganā tasya nīla vat lakṣaṇau sutau
caṇḍāḥ cāru śiraḥ grīvāḥ vyūḍha uraskāḥ tarasvinaḥ

original: nīcairbaddhāḥ kule tasya jāyante nibiḍā gajāḥ // BndP_2,7.340 //
analyzed: nīcaiḥ baddhāḥ kule tasya jāyante nibiḍāḥ gajāḥ
supratīkaḥ tu vairūpyāt sāmnaḥ sārūpya māgataḥ

original: tasya prahārī saṃpātiḥ pṛthuśceti sutāstrayaḥ // BndP_2,7.341 //
analyzed: tasya prahārī saṃpātiḥ pṛthuḥ ca iti sutāḥ trayaḥ
prāṃśavaḥ dīrgha tālu oṣṭhāḥ suvibhakta śiroruhāḥ

original: jāyante mṛdusaṃbhogā vaṃśe tasya mataṅgajāḥ // BndP_2,7.342 //
analyzed: jāyante mṛdu saṃbhogāḥ vaṃśe tasya mataṅga jāḥ
añjanāt añjanaḥ sāmnaḥ vijajñe jāñjanāvatī

original: sutau jātau tayoścāpi pramāthipuruṣau smṛtau // BndP_2,7.343 //
analyzed: sutau jātau tayoḥ ca api pramāthi puruṣau smṛtau
mahā vibhakta śirasaḥ snigdha jīmūta sannibhāḥ
su darśanāḥ su varṣmāṇaḥ padma ābhāḥ parimaṇḍalāḥ
śūrāḥ dīna āyata mukhāḥ gajāḥ tasya anvaye bhavan

original: jajñe cāndramasaḥ sāmnaḥ kumudaḥ kumudadyutiḥ // BndP_2,7.345 //
analyzed: jajñe cāndramasaḥ sāmnaḥ kumudaḥ kumuda dyutiḥ
piṅgalāyām sutau tasya mahā padma ūrmi mālinau
śaila jīmūta saṃkāśān su buddhān balinaḥ varān
hasti yuddha priyān nāgān viddhi tasya kula udbhavān

original: etāndevāsure yuddhe jayārthaṃ jagṛhuḥ surāḥ // BndP_2,7.347 //
analyzed: etān devāsure yuddhe jaya artham jagṛhuḥ surāḥ
kṛtārthaiḥ ca visṛṣṭāḥ te pūrva uktāḥ prayayuḥ diśaḥ
eteṣām ca anvaye jātān vinītān tridaśāḥ daduḥ
aṅgāya lomapādāya sūtrakārāya vai dvipān
dviradaḥ radana dvābhyām hastī hastāt karāt karī
vāraṇaḥ vāraṇāt dantī dantābhyām garjanāt gajaḥ
kuñjaraḥ kuñja cāri tvāt nāgaḥ nagamyam asya yat

original: mattaṃ yātīti mātaṅgo dvipo dvābhyāṃ pibansmṛtaḥ /
analyzed: mattam yāti iti mātaṅgaḥ dvipaḥ dvābhyām piban smṛtaḥ
sāma jaḥ sāma jāta tvāt iti nirvacana kramaḥ
eṣām jihvā parāvṛttiḥ hi uktā vai ca agni śāpa jā

original: balasyānavabodho yo yā caiṣāṃ gūḍhamuṣkatā // BndP_2,7.352 //
analyzed: balasya anavabodhaḥ yaḥ yā ca eṣām gūḍha muṣka tā
ubhayam dantinām etat jñeyam tu sura śāpa jam
deva dāna gandharva piśāca uraga rakṣasām
kanyāsu jātāḥ dignāgaiḥ nānā sattvāḥ tatas gajāḥ
saṃbhūtiḥ ca prasūtiḥ ca nāma nirvacanam tathā
etat gajānām vijñeyam eṣām rājā sa ca abhramaḥ
kauśikyāḥ hi ā samudrāt tu gaṅgā ayaḥ ca yat uttaram
añjanasya eka mūlasya vijñeyam gahanam tu tat

original: uttaraṃ caiva vidhyasya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇaṃ ca yat // BndP_2,7.356 //
analyzed: uttaram ca eva vidhyasya gaṅgāyāḥ dakṣiṇam ca yat
gaṅgodbhede sa kerubhyaḥ supratīkasya pattanam
apareṇa utkalam ca eva kāverībhyaḥ ca paścimam
eka sūka ātmajasya etat vāmanasya vanam smṛtam
apareṇa tu lauhityamāsiṃdhoḥ paścimena tu
padmasya etat vanam proktam anuparvatam eva tat
bhūtāḥ vijajñe bhūtān tu rudrasya anucarān iha
sthūlān kṛśān ca dīrghān ca vāmanān hrasvakān samān
laṃba karṇān pralaṃba oṣṭhān laṃba jihvān tanu udarān
eka netrān virūpān ca laṃba sphic sthūla piṇḍikān
sa kṛṣṇa gaurān nīlān ca śvetān vai lohita ānanān
babhrūn vai śabalān dhūmrān vikadrūn nāsa mārūṇān
sarva yajña upavītinaḥ
bahu śīrṣān vipādān ca hi eka śīrṣān aśīrṣakān
caṇḍān ca vikaṭān ca eva nirmitān ca dvijihvakān
muṇḍān ca jaṭilān ca eva kubjān vakrān sa vāmanān
saraḥ śreṣṭha samudra adri nadī pulina sevinaḥ
eka karṇān mahā karṇān śaṅku karṇān akarṇakān
daṃṣṭriṇaḥ nakhinaḥ ca eva nirdantān ca vijihvakān
eka hastān dvi hastān ca tri hastān ca api ahastakān
eka pādān dvi pādān ca tri pādān bahu pādakān
mahā yogān mahāsattvān sumanaskān mahā balān
sarvatragāta pratighāta brahma jñān kāmarūpiṇaḥ
ghorān krūrān ca medhyān ca madya medhyān su dhārmikān
kūṭa dantān mahā jihvān vikeśān vikṛta ānanān
hasta ādān ca mukha ādān ca śiraḥ dān ca kapālinaḥ
dhanvinaḥ mudgara dharāḥ nasi śūla dharān tathā
digvāsasaḥ citra veṣān citra mālya anulepanān
anna ādān piśita ādān ca surā pān somapān tathā
kecid saṃdhyā carāḥ ghorāḥ kecid saumyāḥ divā carāḥ
naktañcarāḥ khara sparśāḥ ghorāḥ teṣām niśācarāḥ

original: paratvena bhavaṃ devaṃ sarve te gatamānasāḥ /
analyzed: para tvena bhavam devam sarve te gata mānasāḥ

original: naiṣāṃ bhāryāsti putrā vā sarve te hyūrdhvaretasaḥ // BndP_2,7.372 //
analyzed: na eṣām bhāryā asti putrāḥ vā sarve te hi ūrdhvaretasaḥ
śatam tāni sahasrāṇi bhūtānām ātma yoginām

original: bhavapāriṣadāste vai sarve bhūtāḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,7.373 //
analyzed: bhava pāriṣadāḥ te vai sarve bhūtāḥ prakīrttitāḥ

original: kapiśāyāśca kūṣmāṇḍā jajñire ca punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: kapiśāyāḥ ca kūṣmāṇḍāḥ jajñire ca punar punar

original: mithunena piśācāṃśca varṇena kapiśena tu // BndP_2,7.374 //
analyzed: mithunena piśācān ca varṇena kapiśena tu
kapiśa tvāt piśācāḥ te sarve ca piśita aśanāḥ
yugmāni ṣoḍaśa ādyāni varttamānaḥ tad anvayaḥ
nāmataḥ tān pravakṣyāmi rūpataḥ ca tad anvayam

original: chagalaśchagalā caiva vakro vakramukhī tathā // BndP_2,7.376 //
analyzed: chagalaḥ chagalā ca eva vakraḥ vakramukhī tathā
duṣpūraḥ pūraṇā ca eva sūcī sūcīmukhaḥ tathā

original: vipādaśca vipādī ca jvālā cāṅgārakastathā // BndP_2,7.377 //
analyzed: vipādaḥ ca vipādī ca jvālā ca aṅgārakaḥ tathā
kuṃbhapātraḥ ca kuṃbhī ca pratundaḥ ca pratundikā

original: upavīraśca vīrā ca hyulūkhala ulūkhalī // BndP_2,7.378 //
analyzed: upavīraḥ ca vīrā ca hi ulūkhalaḥ ulūkhalī
akarmakaḥ karmakī ca kuṣaṇḍaḥ ca kuṣaṇḍikā

original: pāṇipātraḥ pāṇipātrī pāṃśuḥ pāṃśumatī tathā // BndP_2,7.379 //
nitundaśca nitundī ca nipuṇo nipuṇī tathā /
analyzed: nitundaḥ ca nitundī ca nipuṇaḥ nipuṇī tathā

original: bālādaḥ keṣaṇādī ca praskandaḥ skandikā tathā // BndP_2,7.380 //
analyzed: bālādaḥ keṣaṇādī ca praskandaḥ skandikā tathā
ṣoḍaśānām piśācānām gaṇāḥ proktāḥ tu ṣoḍaśa
ajāmukhā pakramukhāḥ pūraṇaḥ skandinaḥ tathā
vipāda aṅgārikāḥ ca eva kuṃbhapātrāḥ pratundakāḥ
upavīra ulūkhalikāḥ arkamarkāḥ kuṣaṇḍikāḥ
pāṃśavaḥ pāṇipatrāḥ ca naitundāḥ nipuṇāḥ tathā
kalāni etāni ṣoḍaśa
iti etāḥ hi abhi jātāḥ tu kūṣmāṇḍānām prakīrttitāḥ
piśācāḥ te piśācyaḥ tāḥ sakulyāḥ saṃprajajñire
bībhatsam vikṛta ākāram putra pautram anetakam
atas teṣām piśācānām lakṣaṇāni nibodhata
sarva aṅga keśāḥ vatta akṣāḥ daṃṣṭriṇaḥ nakhinaḥ tathā
tiryyagaṅgāḥ pāruṣadāḥ piśācāḥ te hi ajā mukhāḥ
a karṇakāḥ hi a romāṇaḥ vāsasaḥ carma vāsasaḥ
kuṣaṇḍika piśācāḥ te priya bhakṣāḥ sadā āmiṣāḥ
vakra aṅga hastā pādāḥ ca vakra śīla matāḥ tathā

original: jñeyā vakrāḥ piśācāste vakragāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // BndP_2,7.388 //
analyzed: jñeyāḥ vakrāḥ piśācāḥ te vakra gāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ
laṃba udarāḥ tuṇḍa nāsāḥ śiraḥ bhujāḥ
nitundakāḥ piśācāḥ te tila bhakṣāḥ priya asṛjāḥ
vānara ākṛtayaḥ ca eva vācālāḥ pluta gāminaḥ
piśācāḥ kam arkāḥ te vṛkṣa vāsaḥ odana priyāḥ
ūrdhva bāhu ūrddhva romāṇaḥ uddhṛta akṣāḥ yathā ālayāḥ

original: muñcanti pāṃśumaṅgebhyaḥ piśācāḥ pāṃśavastu te // BndP_2,7.391 //
analyzed: muñcanti pāṃśum aṅgebhyaḥ piśācāḥ pāṃśavaḥ tu te
bhramarī sannibhāḥ śuṣka asa śūlāḥ cīra vāsasaḥ
upavīrāḥ piśācāḥ te śmaśāna āyatanāḥ sadā
niṣṭabdha akṣāḥ mahā jihvāḥ lelihānāḥ hi ulūkhalāḥ
ulūkhalaiḥ ābharaṇāḥ ratna dhārāḥ ca te khalāḥ
pāṇi pātrāḥ piśācāḥ te nisṛṣṭa bali bhojanāḥ
hasti uṣṭra sthūla śirasaḥ vinata uddhata piṇḍikāḥ
piśācāḥ kuṃbha pātrāḥ te adṛṣṭa annāni bhuñjate

original: sūkṣmāstu romaśāḥ piṅgā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭāścaranti ye // BndP_2,7.395 //
analyzed: sūkṣmāḥ tu romaśāḥ piṅgāḥ dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭāḥ caranti ye
ayuktān pracaranti iha nipuṇāḥ te piśācakāḥ
ākarṇāt dārita āsyāḥ ca laṃba bhrū sthūla nāsikāḥ
śūnya āgāra priyāḥ sthūlāḥ piśācāḥ te tu pūraṇāḥ
hasta pāda ākrānta tuṇḍāḥ hrasvakāḥ kṣiti dṛṣṭayaḥ
bālādāḥ te piśācāḥ vai sūtikāgṛha sevinaḥ

original: pṛṣṭhataḥ pāṇi pādāśca pṛṣṭhato vātaraṃhasaḥ // BndP_2,7.398 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhatas pāṇi pādāḥ ca pṛṣṭhatas vāta raṃhasaḥ
vipādakāḥ piśācāḥ te saṃgrāme rudhira aśanāḥ
nagnakāḥ hi aniketāḥ ca laṃbaśephaḥ āṇḍapiḍakāḥ
piśācāḥ skandinaḥ te vai anye uccheṣaṇa ādinaḥ

original: ṣoḍaśaitā hi jātyastāḥ piśācānāṃ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_2,7.400 //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa etāḥ hi jātyaḥ tāḥ piśācānām prakīrttitāḥ
evaṃvidhān piśācān tu dīnān dṛṣṭvā anukaṃpayā
brahmā tebhyaḥ varam prādāt kāruṇyāt alpa cetasaḥ
antardhānam prajāyām hi kāmarūpi tvam eva ca

original: saṃdhye ubhe pracāraṃ ca sthānānyājīvameva ca // BndP_2,7.402 //
analyzed: saṃdhye ubhe pracāram ca sthānāni ājīvam eva ca

original: vidhvastāni ca yāni syuranācāroṣitā ni ca // BndP_2,7.403 //
analyzed: vidhvastāni ca yāni syuḥ anācāra uṣitā ca
a saṃmṛṣṭa upaliptāni saṃskāraiḥ varjitāni tu
rājamārga uparathyāḥ ca niṣkuṭāḥ catvarāṇi ca
dvārāṇi aṭṭālakān ca eva nirgamāḥ saṃkramāḥ tathā

original: patho nadyo 'tha tīrthāni caityavṛkṣā mahāpatham // BndP_2,7.405 //
analyzed: pathaḥ nadyaḥ tha tīrthāni caitya vṛkṣāḥ mahāpatham

original: adhārmiko janasteṣāmā jīvo vihitaḥ suraiḥ // BndP_2,7.406 //
analyzed: adhārmikaḥ janaḥ teṣām ā jīvaḥ vihitaḥ suraiḥ
varṇa āśramāḥ saṃkarikāḥ kāru śilpi janāḥ tathā
prakṛta upadhi saṃdhānāḥ corāḥ viśvāsa ghātinaḥ
etaiḥ anyaiḥ ca bahubhiḥ anyāya upārjitaiḥ api
ārabhyante kriyāyāḥ tu piśācāḥ tatra daivatam
madhu māṃsa odanaiḥ dadhnā tila cūrṇaiḥ surā āsavaiḥ
dhūpaiḥ hāridra kṛsaraiḥ tila bhakṣa guḍa odanaiḥ
kṛṣṇāni ca eva vāsāṃsi dhūpaḥ kṣayaḥ
eva suktāḥ tu balayaḥ tu eṣām vai parva saṃdhiṣu
piśācānām anujñāya brahmā ca adhipatim dadau
sarva bhūta piśācānām girīṇām śūla pāṇinām
daṃṣṭrā tu ajanayat putrān siṃhān vyāghrān ca bhāminī
dvīpinaḥ ca sutāḥ tasyāḥ śvāpadāḥ ca āmiṣa āśinaḥ
ṛṣāyāḥ tu api kārtsnye prajā sargam nibodhata

original: tasyā duhitaraḥ pañca tāsāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // BndP_2,7.413 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ duhitaraḥ pañca tāsām nāmāni me śṛṇu

original: mīnāmīnā tathā vṛttā pari vṛttā tathaiva ca /
analyzed: mīnāmīnā tathā vṛttā pari vṛttā tathā eva ca

original: anuvṛttā ca vijñeyā tāsāṃ vai śṛṇuta prajāḥ // BndP_2,7.414 //
analyzed: anuvṛttā ca vijñeyā tāsām vai śṛṇuta prajāḥ
sahasra daṃṣṭrāḥ makarāḥ pāṭhīnāḥ timira uhitāḥ

original: ityevamādirhi gaṇo maino vistīrṇa ucyate // BndP_2,7.415 //
analyzed: iti evamādiḥ hi gaṇaḥ mainaḥ vistīrṇaḥ ucyate
grāhāḥ caturvidhāḥ jñeyāḥ madgurāḥ śaṅkavaḥ tathā
ugrāḥ ca śiśumārāḥ ca āmīnāḥ ca etān vyajāyata
vṛttā karma vikārāṇi nā ekāni jalacāriṇām
tathā śaṅkha vikārāṇi janayāmāsa na ekaśas
maṇḍūkānām vikārāṇi hi anuvṛttā vyajāyata

original: aiṇeyānāṃ vikārāṇi śaṃbūkānāṃ tathaiva ca // BndP_2,7.418 //
analyzed: aiṇeyānām vikārāṇi śaṃbūkānām tathā eva ca
tathā varāṭa vikṛtāni ca
tathā śaṅkha vikārāṇi parivṛttā vyajāyata
kālakaṇṭha vikārāṇi jalūkā vikṛtāni ca

original: ityeṣa hi ṛṣāvaṃśaḥ pañcaśākhaḥ prakīrttitaḥ // BndP_2,7.420 //
analyzed: iti eṣa hi ṛṣāvaṃśaḥ pañcaśākhaḥ prakīrttitaḥ
tiryā hetukam api āhuḥ vahulam vaṃśa vistaram

original: saṃsvedajavikārāṇi yathā yebhyo bhavanti ha // BndP_2,7.421 //
analyzed: saṃsveda ja vikārāṇi yathā yebhyaḥ bhavanti ha
sveda klinna śarīrebhyaḥ yūkā likṣā ādikāḥ dvijāḥ
manuṣya sveda mala jāḥ uśanāḥ nāma jantavaḥ
nānā pipīlika gaṇāḥ kīṭakāḥ bahu pādakāḥ
śaṅkha upala vikārāṇi kīlaka āvarakāṇi ca
iti evamādi bahulāḥ sveda jāḥ pārthivāḥ gaṇāḥ
yathā vṛṣṭibhyaḥ eva
na ekāḥ mṛga śarīrebhyaḥ jāyante jantavaḥ tu ime
makṣikāḥ picchalāḥ deśāḥ tathā tittiri puttikāḥ
nīla acatrāḥ ca jāyante mala jāḥ bahu vistarāḥ
jala jāḥ sveda jāḥ ca eva jāyante jantaḥ tu ime
kāśa toya jakāḥ kīṭāḥ naladāḥ bahu pādakāḥ
siṃhalāḥ romalāḥ ca eva picchilāḥ parikīrttitāḥ
iti evamādiḥ hi gaṇaḥ jala ja sveda jaḥ smṛtaḥ
śiṃbibhyaḥ māṣa mudgānām jāyante kṛmayaḥ tathā

original: tathā svānugataṃ pitrorbhrātṝṇāṃ caiva ceṣṭitam // BndP_2,21.31 //
analyzed: tathā sva anugatam pitroḥ bhrātṝṇām ca eva ceṣṭitam
evam tayoḥ mahā rāja sat prīti janita eguṇaiḥ
prīyamāṇaḥ vasat rāmaḥ pituḥ pitroḥ niveśane
sa tasmin sarva bhūtānām manaḥ nayana nandanaḥ
uvāsa katicid māsān tad śuśrūṣā parāyaṇaḥ
athā anujñāpya tau rājan bhṛgu varyaḥ mahāmanāḥ
pitāmaha guroḥ gantum iyeṣa āśrayam āśramam
sa tābhyām prīti yuktābhyām āśīrbhiḥ abhinanditaḥ

original: yathā cābhyāṃ pradiṣṭena yayā vaurvāśramaṃ prati // BndP_2,21.35 //
analyzed: yathā ca ābhyām pradiṣṭena yayā vaurva āśramam prati
tam namaskṛtya vidhivat cyavanam ca mahā tapāḥ
sa praharṣam tad ājñātaḥ prayayau āśramam bhṛgoḥ
sa gatvā a muni mukhyasya bhṛgoḥ āśrama maṇḍalam
dadarśa śānta cetobhiḥ munibhiḥ sarvatas vṛtam
su snigdha śītala chāyaiḥ sarvartuka guṇa anvitaiḥ
tarubhiḥ saṃvṛtam prītaḥ phala puṣpa uttara anvitaiḥ
nānā khaga kula ārāvaiḥ manaḥ śrotra sukha āvahaiḥ
brahmaghoṣaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ sarvatas pratināditam
sa mantra āhuti homa uttha dhūma gandhena sarvatas
nirasta nikhila agha ogham vana antara visarpiṇā
samidh kuśa āharaiḥ daṇḍa mekhalā ajina maṇḍitaiḥ
abhitas śobhitam rājan ramyaiḥ muni kumārakaiḥ
prasūna jala saṃpūrma pātra hastābhiḥ antarā
śobhitam muni kalyābhiḥ carantībhiḥ itas tatas
sa pota hariṇī yūthaiḥ visraṃbhāt aviśaṅkibhiḥ
uṭaja aṅgaṇa paryanta taru chāyāsu adhiṣṭhitam
romanthataḥ parāmṛṣṭi yūtha sākṣika mud pradaiḥ
prārabdha tāṇḍavam kekī mayūraiḥ madhura svaraiḥ
pravikīrṇa kaṇā uddeśam mṛga śabdaiḥ samīpa gaiḥ
an ālīḍha ātapa chāyā śuṣyat nīvāra rāśibhiḥ
hūyamāna analam kāle pūjyamāna atithi vrajam
paṭhyamāna akhila smārttam śrauta artha pravicāraṇam
prārabdha pitṛ deva ijyam sarva bhūta manoharam
tapasvi jana bhūyiṣṭha mākā puruṣa sevitam
tapaḥ vṛddhi karam puṇyam sarva sattva sukha āspadam
tapodhana ānanda karam brahma lokam iva aparam
prasūna saurabha bhrāmyat madhupa ara avanāditam
sarvatas vījyamānena vividhena nabhasvatā
evaṃvidha guṇa upetam paśyan āśramam uttamam
praviveśa vinīta ātmā sukṛtī iva amara ālayam
saṃpraviśya śrama upāntam rāmaḥ sva prapitāmaham
dadarśa paritas rājan muni śiṣya śata āvṛtam
vyākhyāna vedikā madhye niviṣṭam kuśa viṣṭare
sita śmaśru jaṭā kūrca brahmasūtra upaśobhitam
vāmetara ūru madhyāsta vāma jaṅghena jānunā
yogapaṭṭena saṃvīta sva deham ṛṣi puṅgavam
vyākhyāna mudrā vilasat savya pāṇi tala aṃbujam
samyak āraṇya vākyānām sūkṣma tattva artha saṃhatim
vivṛtya muni mukhyebhyaḥ śrāvayantam tapaḥ nidhim

original: pituḥ pitāmahaṃ ddaṣṭvā rāmastasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_2,21.56 //
analyzed: pituḥ pitāmaham ddaṣṭvā rāmaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ
śanais iva mahā rāja samīpam samupāgamat
tam āgatam upālakṣya tad prabhāva pradharṣitāḥ
śaṅkām avāpuḥ munayaḥ dūrāt eva akhilāḥ nṛpa
tāvat ūbhṛguḥ ameya ātmā tad āgamana toṣitaḥ
nivṛtta anya kathā ālāpaḥ tam paśyan āsa pārthiva
rāmaḥ pi tam upāgamya vinaya avanata ānanaḥ
avandata yathānyayam upendraḥ iva vedhasam

original: abhivādya yathānyāyaṃ khyātiṃ ca vinayānvitaḥ // BndP_2,21.60 //
analyzed: abhivādya yathānyāyam khyātim ca vinaya anvitaḥ
tān ca saṃbhāvayāmāsa munīn rāmaḥ yathāvayas
taiḥ ca sarvaiḥ mudā upetaiḥ āśīrbhiḥ abhivarddhitaḥ
upāviveśa medhāvī bhūmau teṣām anujñayā
upaviṣṭam tatas rāmam āśīrbhiḥ abhinanditam
papraccha kuśala praśnam tam ālokya bhṛguḥ tadā

original: kuśalaṃ khalu te vatsa pitrośca kimanāmayam // BndP_2,21.63 //
analyzed: kuśalam khalu te vatsa pitroḥ ca kim anāmayam
bhrātṝṇām ca eva bhavataḥ pituḥ pitroḥ tathā eva ca
kimartham āgataḥ tra tvam adhunā amama sannidhim
kena api vā tvam ādiṣṭaḥ svayam eva athavā āgataḥ
tatas rāmaḥ yathānyāyam tasmai sarvam aśeṣatas
kathayāmāsa yat pṛṣṭam tadā tena mahātmanā

original: piturmātuśca vṛttānta bhrātṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām // BndP_2,21.66 //
analyzed: pituḥ mātuḥ ca vṛttānta bhrātṝṇām ca mahātmanām
pituḥ pritroḥ ca kauśalya darśanam ca tayoḥ nṛpa

original: etadanyacca sakalaṃ bhṛgoḥ sapraśrayaṃ mudā // BndP_2,21.67 //
analyzed: etat anyat ca sakalam bhṛgoḥ sa praśrayam mudā
nyavedayat yathānyāyam ātmanaḥ ca samīhitam
śrutvā etat akhilam rājan rāmeṇa samudīritam

original: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā viśeṣeṇa bhṛguḥ prīto 'bhyanandata /
analyzed: tam ca dṛṣṭvā viśeṣeṇa bhṛguḥ prītaḥ bhyanandata
evam tasya priyam kurvan utkṛṣṭaiḥ ātma karmabhiḥ
tatra āśrame vasat rāmaḥ dināni katicid nṛpa
tatas kadācid ekānte rāmam muni vara uttamaḥ
vatsa āgaccha iti tam rājan upāhvayat upahvare
saḥ bhigamya tam āsīnam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
tasthau tad puratas rāmaḥ su prītena antarātmanā
āśīrbhiḥ abhinandya atha bhṛguḥ tam prīta mānasaḥ
prāha na adhigata āśaṅkam rāmam ālokya sa ādaram

original: śruṇu vatsa vaco mahya yattvāṃ vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam // BndP_2,21.73 //
analyzed: śruṇu vatsa vacaḥ yat tvām vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam
hita artham sarva lokānām tava ca asmākam eva ca
gaccha putra mama ādeśāt himavantam mahā girim
adhunā eva āśramāt asmāt tapase dhṛta mānasaḥ
tatra gatvā mahābhāga kṛtvā āśrama āpadam śubham
ārādhaya mahādevam tapasā niyamena ca

original: prītimutpādya tasya tvaṃ bhaktyānanyagayā cirāt // BndP_2,21.76 //
analyzed: prītim utpādya tasya tvam bhaktyā ananyagayā cirāt
śreyaḥ mahat avāpnoṣi na atra kāryā vijāraṇā

original: tarasā tava bhaktyā ca prīto bhavati śaṅkaraḥ // BndP_2,21.77 //
analyzed: tarasā tava bhaktyā ca prītaḥ bhavati śaṅkaraḥ

original: kariṣyati ca te sarvaṃ manasā yadyadicchasi /
analyzed: kariṣyati ca te sarvam manasā yat yat icchasi
tuṣṭe tasmin jagannāthe śaṅkare bhakta vatsale
astra grāmam aśeṣam tvam vaṇu putra yathā īpsitam

original: tvayā hitārthaṃ devānāṃ karaṇīyaṃ suduṣkaram // BndP_2,21.79 //
analyzed: tvayā hita artham devānām karaṇīyam su duṣkaram
vidyate bhyadhikam karma śastra sādhyam anekaśas
tasmāt tvam devadeveśam samārādhaya śaṅkaram
bhaktyā paramayā yuktaḥ tatas bhīṣṭam avāpsyasi

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde ekaviṃśati tamaudhyāyaḥ // 21//
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyu prokte madhya bhāge tṛtīye upoddhāta pāde
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca
iti evam uktaḥ bhṛguṇā tathā iti uktvā praṇamya ca
rāmaḥ tena abhyanujñātaḥ cakāra gamane manaḥ
bhṛgum khyātim ca vidhivat parikramya praṇamya ca
pariṣvaktaḥ tathā tābhyām āśīrbhiḥ ā abhinanditaḥ
munīn ca tān namaskṛtya taiḥ sarvaiḥ anumoditaḥ
niścakram āśramāt tasmāt tapase kṛta niścayaḥ
tatas guru niyogena tad uktena eva vartmanā

original: himavantaṃ girivaraṃ yayau rāmo mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,22.4 //
analyzed: himavantam giri varam yayau rāmaḥ mahā manāḥ
saḥ tītya vividhān deśān parvatān saritaḥ tathā
vanāni muni mukhyānām āvāsān ca atyagāt śanais
tatra tatra nivāseṣu munīnām nivasan pathi

original: tīrtheṣu kṣetramukhyeṣu nivasanvā yayau śanaiḥ // BndP_2,22.6 //
analyzed: tīrtheṣu kṣetra mukhyeṣu nivasan vā yayau śanais
atītya su bahūn deśān paśyan api manoramān
āsasāda ca la śreṣṭham himavantam anuttamam
sa gatvā parvata varam nānā druma latā sthitam
dadarśa vipulaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ ullikhantam iva aṃbaram
nānā dhātu vicitraiḥ ca pradeśaiḥ upaśobhitam
ratna oṣadhībhiḥ abhitas sphuradbhiḥ abhiśobhitam
sa anilena analena ucchaiḥ dahyamānam navam kvacid
kvacid ravi kara āmarśa jvalat arka ipala agnibhiḥ
dravat himā śilā jātu jala śānta dava analam
sphurat paraspara chāyā śaraiḥ ddīpta vanam kvacid
upatyaka śilā pṛṣṭha vāla ātapa niṣevibhiḥ
tuṣāra klinna siddha oghauḥ udbhāsita vanam kvacid
kvacid arka āśu saṃbhinnaḥ cāmīkara śilā āśritaiḥ
yakṣa oghaiḥ bhāsita upāntam viśadbhiḥ iva pāvakam
darīmukha viniṣkrānta tarakṣu utpatana ākulaiḥ
mṛga yūtha ārtta sat nādaiḥ āpūrita guham kvacid
yuddhyat varāha śārdūla yūthapaiḥ itas steram
prasabha unmṛṣṭa kānta uru śilā taru taṭam kvacid
kalabha unmeṣaṇa ākṛṣṭa kariṇībhiḥ anudrutaiḥ
gavayaiḥ khura saṃkṣuṇṇa śilā prastha taṭa aṅku acit
vā asi tarthe
yuddhi adbhiḥ cūrṇita aneka gaṇḍa śaila vanam kvacid
bṛṃhita śravaṇa āmarṣāt mātam gān abhidhāvatām
siṃhānām caraṇa kṣuṇṇa nakha bhinna uparam kvacid
sahasā nipatat siṃha nakha nirbhinna mastakaiḥ
gajaiḥ ākranda nādena pūryam āmam vanam kvacid
aṣṭapāda bala ākṛṣṭa kesarāḥ dāruṇa ākhaiḥ
bhedyamāna akhila śilā gaṃbhīra kuharam kvacid
saṃrabdhāḥ neka śabara prasaktaiḥ ṛ yūthapaiḥ
itaretara saṃmardam viprabhagna dṛṣad kvacid
giri kuñjeṣu saṃkrīḍat kariṇīma dvipam kvacid
kareṇum ādravat matta gaja ākalita kānanam
svapat siṃha mukha śvāsa marut purma darī śatam
gahaneṣu guru trāsa sa āśaṅka viharat mṛgam
kaṇṭāka śliṣṭa lāṅgūla loma truṭana kātaraiḥ
krīḍitam camarī yūthaiḥ manda manda vicāribhiḥ
giri kandara saṃsakta kinnarī samudīritaiḥ
sa tāla nādaiḥ udinaiḥ bhṛta aśeṣa diśā mukham
araṇya devatānām ca cara itīnām itas tatas
alaktaka rasa klinna caraṇa aṅkita bhū talam
mayūra kekirī vṛndaiḥ saṃgīta madhura svaraiḥ
pravṛtta nṛttam paritas vitata udagra barhibhiḥ
jala sthalaruha aneka kusuma utkara varṣibhiḥ
gātra āhlāda karaiḥ mandam vījyamānam vana anilaiḥ
bhūta ārttava rasa āsvādam ādyat puṃskokila āravaiḥ
ākulīkṛta paryanta sahakāra vana antaram
nānā puṣpa āsava unmādyat bhṛṅga saṃgīta nāditam
aneka vihaga ārāva badhirīkṛta kānanam
madhu drava ārdrā virala pratyagra kusuma utkaraiḥ
vanānta māruta ākīrṇaiḥ alaṅkṛta mahī talam
upariṣṭāt nipatatām viṣama upala saṃkaṭe
nirjharāṇām mahā rāvaiḥ samantāt badhirīkṛtam
vitata aneka saṃsakta śākhā agra avirala chadaiḥ
pāṭalaiḥ viṭapa chāyaiḥ upaśalya samutthitaiḥ
kapittha panasa aśoka sahakāre guda aśanaiḥ
nāga caṃpaka punnāga kovidāra priyaṅgubhiḥ
priyāla nīpa bakula bandhūka akṣa tamālakaiḥ
drākṣā madhūka āmalaka jaṃbū kaṅkola jātibhiḥ
bilva arjuna karañja āmra bījapūra aṅghripaiḥ api
picula aṃbaṣṭha kanaka vaikaṅkata śamīdhavaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ vṛkṣaiḥ samantāt upaśobhitam
nirantara taru chāyā su dūra vinivāritaiḥ
samantāt arka kiraṇaiḥ an āsādita bhū talam
nānā pakva phala āsvāda bala puṣṭaiḥ plava gamaiḥ
ākrānta cakita aneka vana paṅkti śata ākulam
tatra tatra ati ramyaiḥ ca śilā kuhara nirgataiḥ
pratāpa viṣamaiḥ rājan hrāsyamānam sarit śataiḥ
sārovaraiḥ ca vipulaiḥ kumuda utpala maṇḍitaiḥ
nānā vihaga saṃghuṣṭaiḥ samantāt upaśobhitam
samāsādya atha śaila indram tuṣāra śiśiram girim
āruroha bhagu śreṣṭhaḥ tarasā tam mudā anvitaḥ

original: tasya praviśya gahanaṃ vanaṃ rāmo mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,22.44 //
analyzed: tasya praviśya gahanam vanam rāmaḥ mahā manāḥ
vicacāra śanais rājan upaśalya mahīruham

original: sa tatra vicarandikṣu hariṇībhiḥ samantataḥ // BndP_2,22.45 //
analyzed: sa tatra vicaran dikṣu hariṇībhiḥ samantataḥ
vikṣyamāṇaḥ mudam lebhe sa āśaṅkam mugdha dṛṣṭibhiḥ
sa tatra kusuma āmoda gandhibhiḥ vana vāyubhiḥ
vījyamānaḥ jaharṣe sa vīkṣya udārām vana śriyam
vividhāḥ ca stharīḥ sūkṣmam uparikramya bhārgavaḥ
dvandvān ca dhātūn vividhān paśyan evam atarkayat
aho yam sarva śailānām ādhipatye bhiṣecitaḥ
brahmaṇā yajña bhāj ca eva sthāne saṃpratipāditaḥ
asya śaila adhirāja tvam su vyaktam abhilakṣyate
ravaiḥ kīcaka veṇunām madhurīkṛta kānanaḥ
nitaṃba sthala saṃsakta tuṣāra nicaya egyam
vibhāti iva āhita svaccha parīta dhavala aṃśukaḥ
nibiḍa śrita nīhāra nikareṇa tathā upari
nānā varṇa uttarāsaṃga āvṛtta aṅgaḥ
candana aguru karpūra kastūrī kuṅkuma ādibhiḥ
su vyaktam dṛśyate vilāsi vat
mṛgendra āhata dantī indra kuṃbha sthala paricyutaiḥ
sthūla muktā utkaraiḥ eṣa vibhāti paritas giriḥ
nānā vṛkṣa latā vallī puṣpa alaṅkṛta mūrddhajaḥ
nīrandhra āñcita me gha ogha vitāna samalaṅkṛtaḥ
nānā dhātu vicitra aṅgaḥ sarva ratna vibhūṣitaḥ
gaja aśva mukha yūthaiḥ ca samantāt parivāritaḥ
vivikta gahvara āsthāna madhya siṃhāsana āśrayaḥ
samantāt pratisaṃsakta taru vetravatām śanais
dṛṣṭvā janaiḥ anāsādyaḥ mahā rāja adhirāja vat
dodhūyamānaḥ vicarat camarīcā ru cāmaraiḥ
mayūraiḥ upanṛtyadbhiḥ gāyadbhiḥ ca eva kinnaraiḥ
sattva jātaiḥ anekaiḥ ca sevyamānaḥ virājate
vyaktam eva acala indrāṇām adhirājya pade sthitaḥ
bhunakti ākramya vasudhām samagrām śriyam ojasā
evam saṃcintayānaḥ sa himādri vana gahvare

original: vicacāra ciraṃ rāmo mudā paramayā yutaḥ /
analyzed: vicacāra ciram rāmaḥ mudā paramayā yutaḥ
āsasāda vane tasmin vipule bhṛgu puṅgavaḥ
sarovaram mahā rāja vipulam vimala udakam
kumuda utpala kahlāra nikaraiḥ upasobhitam
paṅkajaiḥ utpalaiḥ ca eva rakta pītaiḥ sita asitaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca sarvatas samalaṅkṛtam
haṃsa sārasa dātyūha kāraṇḍava śataiḥ api
saṃghuṣyamāṇam paritas sevitam manda vāyunā
śapharī matsya saṃghaiḥ ca vicaradbhiḥ itas tatas
antar janita kallolaiḥ nṛtyamānam iva abhitas
āsasāda bhṛgu śreṣṭhaḥ tat sarovaram uttamam
nānā patatrri virutaiḥ madhurīkṛta diś taṭam

original: sa tasya tīre vipulaṃ kṛtvāśramapadaṃ śubham // BndP_2,22.68 //
analyzed: sa tasya tīre vipulam kṛtvā āśrama padam śubham

original: rāmo matimatāṃ śreṣṭhastapase ca mano dadhe /
analyzed: rāmaḥ matimatām śreṣṭhaḥ tapase ca manaḥ dadhe
śāka mūla phala āhāraḥ niyatam niyata indriyaḥ
tapaḥ cacāra deveśam viniveśya ātma mānase
bhṛgu upadiṣṭa mārgeṇa bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ
pūjayāmāsa deveśam ekāgra manasā nṛpa

original: aniketaḥ sa varṣāsu śiśire jalasaṃśrayaḥ // BndP_2,22.71 //
analyzed: aniketaḥ sa varṣāsu śiśire jala saṃśrayaḥ
grīṣme pañjāgni madhya sthaḥ cacāra evam tapaḥ ciram
ripūn nirjitya kāma ādīn ūrmiṣa ṣaṭkam vidhūya ca
dvandvaiḥ an udvejita dhīḥ tāpa doṣaiḥ an ākulaḥ
yamaiḥ sa niyamaiḥ ca eva śuddha dehaḥ samāhitaḥ
vaśī cakāra pavanam prāṇāyāmena deha gam
vaśī cakāra ca akṣāṇi pratyāhāra parāyaṇaḥ
dhāraṇābhiḥ sthirīcakre manaḥ cañcalam ātmavān
dhyānena devadeveśam dadarśa parameśvaram
svastha antar karaṇaḥ maitraḥ sarva bādhā vivarjitaḥ
cintayāmāsa deveśam dhyāne dṛṣṭvā jagadgurum
dhyeya avasthi ta citta ātmā niścala idriya dehavān
ā kāla avadhi saḥ tiṣṭhan nivāta stha pradīpa vat
japan ca devadeveśam dhyāyan ca sva manīṣayā
ārādhayat ameya ātmā sarva bhāva stham īśvaram

original: tataḥ sa niṣphalaṃ rūpamaiśvaraṃ yannirañjanam // BndP_2,22.79 //
analyzed: tatas sa niṣphalam rūpam aiśvaram yat nirañjanam
param jyotiḥ acintyam yat yogi dhyeyam anuttamam
nityam śuddham sadā śāntam atīndriyam anaupamam

original: sthitvā nāticiraṃ kālamatha gantumiyeṣa saḥ // BndP_2,25.72 //

pṛthak vimiśraiḥ bhavanaiḥ anekaiḥ sat bhāsitam netra manaḥ abhirāmaiḥ
mahārha ratna ujjvala hema vedikā niṣkūṭa sopāna kuṭī viṭaṅkakaiḥ
tulā kapāṭa ṛgala kuḍya dehalī niśānta śālā ajira śobhitaiḥ bhṛśam
valabhya linda aṅgapā cāru toraṇaiḥ adabhra paryanta catuṣkikā ādibhiḥ

original: staṃbheṣu kuḍyeṣu ca divyaratnavicitracitraiḥ pariśobhamānaiḥ // BndP_2,26.60 //
analyzed: staṃbheṣu kuḍyeṣu ca divya ratna vicitra citraiḥ pariśobhamānaiḥ
uccāvacaiḥ ratna varaiḥ vicitra suvarṇa siṃhāsana pīṭhikā ādyaiḥ
sa bhakṣya bhojya ādibhiḥ ranna pānaiḥ upeta bhāṇḍa upagata eka deśaiḥ
gṛhaiḥ amartya ucita sarva saṃpad samanvitaiḥ netra manaḥ abhirāmaiḥ
tasya āśramam sat nagara upamānam babhau vadhūbhiḥ ca manoharābhiḥ

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyabhāge tṛtīya
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyu prokte madhya bhāge tṛtīya
upoddhāta pādeḥ juna upākhyāne ṣaḍviṃśatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca
tasmin pure santulita amaredra purī prabhāve muni varya dhenuḥ
vinirmame teṣu gṛheṣu paścāt tad yogya nārī nara vṛnda jātam
vicitra veṣa ābharaṇa prasūna gandha aṃśuka alaṅkṛta vigrahābhiḥ
saha avabhāvābhiḥ udāra ceṣṭā śrī kānti saundarya guṇa anvitābhiḥ
manda sphurat danta marīci jāla vidyotita ānana saroja jita indu bhābhiḥ
pratyagra yauvana bhara asavalgu gīrbhiḥ sa prema manthara kaṭākṣa nirīkṣaṇābhiḥ
prīti prasanna hṛdayābhiḥ ati prabhābhiḥ śṛṅgāra kalpataru puṣpa vibhūṣitābhiḥ
deva aṅganā tulita saubhaga saukumārya rūpa abhilāṣa madhura ākṛti rañjitābhiḥ
uttapta hema kalaśa upama cāru pīna vakṣoruha dvaya bhara ānata madhyamābhiḥ
śroṇī bhara ākramaṇa kheda pariśrita āsmṛga ārakta pāvaka rasa aruṇita aṅghri bhūbhiḥ
keyūra hāra maṇi kaṅkaṇa hema kaṇṭha sūtra amala śravaṇa maṇḍala maṇḍitābhiḥ
sraj dāma cumbita sa kuntala keśapāśa kāñcī kalāpa pariśiñjita nūpurābhiḥ
āmṛṣṭa roṣa parisāṃtvana narma hāsa kelī priya ālapana bhartsana roṣaṇeṣu
bhāveṣu pārthiva nija priya dhairya bandha sarva apahāra catureṣu kṛtāntarābhiḥ
tantrī svana upamita mañjula saumya geya gandharva tāra madhura ārava bhāṣiṇībhiḥ
vīṇā pravīṇatara pāṇi tala aṅgulībhiḥ gaṃbhīra cakra caṭu vāda rata utsukābhiḥ
strībhiḥ mada alasa tarābhiḥ ati pragalbha bhāvābhiḥ ākulita kāmuka mānasābhiḥ
kāma prayoga nipuṇābhiḥ ahīna saṃpad audārya rūpa guṇa śīla samanvitābhiḥ
saṃkhyā atigābhiḥ aniśam gṛha kṛtya karma vyagra ātmakābhiḥ api tad paricārikābhiḥ
puṃbhiḥ ca tad guṇa gaṇa ucita rūpa śobhaiḥ udbhāsitaiḥ gṛhacaraiḥ paritas parītam
sa rājamārga āpaṇa saudha sadma sopāna devālaya catvareṣu
pauraiḥ aśeṣa artha guṇaiḥ samantāt adhyāsyamānam paripūrṇa kāmaiḥ
aneka ratna ujjvalitaiḥ vicitraiḥ prāsāda saṃghaiḥ atulaiḥ asaṃkhyaiḥ
ratha aśva mātaṅga khara uṣṭra gojā yogyaiḥ anekaiḥ api mandiraiḥ ca
nara idra sāmanta niṣādi sādi padāti senapati nāyakānām

original: viprādikānāṃ rathisārathīnāṃ gṛhaistathā māgadhabandināṃ ca // BndP_2,27.13 //
analyzed: vipra ādikānām rathi sārathīnām gṛhaiḥ tathā māgadha bandinām ca
vivikta rathyā āpaṇa citra catvaraiḥ aneka vastu kraya vikrayaiḥ ca
mahādhana upaskara sādhu nirmitaiḥ gṛhaiḥ ca śubhraiḥ gaṇikā janānām
mahārha ratna ujjvala tuṅga gopuraiḥ saha śva gṛdhra vraja nartana ālayaiḥ
citraiḥ dhvacaiḥ ca api patākikābhiḥ śubhraiḥ paṭaiḥ maṇḍapikābhiḥ unnataiḥ
kahlāra kañja kumuda utpala reṇu vāsitaiḥ cakāhva haṃsa kurarī baka sārasānām
nānā rava āḍhya ramaṇīya taṭāka vāpī sarovaraiḥ ca api jala upapannaiḥ
cūta priyāla panasa āmra madhūka jaṃbū plakṣaiḥ navaiḥ ca tarubhiḥ ca kṛta ālavālaiḥ
paryanta ropita manorama nāga ketakī punnāga caṃpaka vanaiḥ ca patatri juṣṭaiḥ
mandāra kunda karavīra manojña yūthikā jāti ādikaiḥ vividha puṣpa phalaiḥ ca vṛkṣaiḥ
saṃlakṣyamāṇa paritopa vana ālibhiḥ ca saṃśobhitam jagati vismayanīya rūpaiḥ
sarva ṛttuka pravara saurabha vāyu manda manda pracāri bhartsita dharma kālam
sura asura manorama bhoga saṃpad vispaṣṭa māna vibhavam nagaram

original: saubhāgyabhogamamitaṃ munihomadhenuḥ sadyo vidhāya vinivedayadāśu tasmai /
analyzed: saubhāgya bhogam amitam muni homadhenuḥ sadyas vidhāya vinivedayat āśu tasmai

original: jñātvā tato munivaro dvijahomadhenvā saṃpāditaṃ narapate rucirātitheyam // BndP_2,27.20 //

original: āhūya kañcana tadantika mātmaśiṣyaṃ prāsthāpayatsaguṇaśālinamāśu rājan /
analyzed: āhūya kañcana tad antika mātma śiṣyam prāsthāpayat sa guṇa śālinam āśu rājan

original: gatvā viśāmadhipatestarasā samīpaṃ saṃpraśrayaṃ munisutastamidaṃ babhāṣe // BndP_2,27.21 //

original: rājā tato munivareṇa kṛtābhyanujñaḥ saṃprāviśatpuravaraṃ svakṛte kṛtaṃ tat // BndP_2,27.22 //

original: antaḥ praviśya nagararddhimaśeṣalokasaṃmohinīm bhisamīkṣya sa rājavaryaḥ // BndP_2,27.23 //
analyzed: antar praviśya nagara ṛddhim aśeṣa loka saṃmohinīm sa rāja varyaḥ

original: prītiprasannavadanaḥ sabalastu dānī dhīro 'pi vismayamavāpa bhṛśaṃ tadānīm /
analyzed: prīti prasanna vadanaḥ sabalaḥ tu dānī vismayam avāpa bhṛśam tadānīm
gacchan sura strī nayanā li yūtha pāna eka pātra ucita cāru mūrttiḥ

original: reme sa haihayapatiḥ purarājamārge śakraḥ kuberavasatāviva sāmaraughaḥ /
analyzed: reme sa haihaya patiḥ pura rājamārge śakraḥ kubera vasatau iva sa amara oghaḥ
tam prasthitam rāja pathāt samantāt paura aṅganāḥ candana vāri siktaiḥ
prasūna lājā prakaraiḥ ajasram avīpṛṣan saudha gatāḥ sutdṛdyaiḥ
abhyāgata arhaṇa samutsuka paura kāntā hasta aravinda galita amala lāja varṣaiḥ

tatratya paura vanitā añjana ratna sāra muktābhiḥ api anupadam

original: brāhmīṃ tapaḥśriya mudāragaṇamacintyāṃ lokeṣu durlabhatarāṃ spṛhaṇīyaśobhām // BndP_2,27.28 //

original: paśyanviśāmadhipatiḥ purasaṃpadaṃ tāmuccaiḥ śaśaṃsa manasā vacaseva rājan /
analyzed: paśyan viśām adhipatiḥ pura saṃpadam tām uccais śaśaṃsa manasā vacasā iva rājan

original: mene ca haihayapatirbhuvi durlabheyaṃ kṣātrī manoharatarā mahitā hi saṃpat // BndP_2,27.29 //

original: gacchatsvapārśvacara darśitavarṇasaudho lebhe mudaṃ purajanaiḥ paripūjyamānaḥ /

original: rājā tato munivaropacitāṃ saparyāmātmānurūpamiha sānucaro labhasva // BndP_2,27.31 //

original: kakṣāntarāṇi nṛpatiḥ śanakairatītya trīṇi krameṇa ca sasaṃbhramakañcukīni // BndP_2,27.33 //

tatra pradīpa dadhi darpaṇa gandha puṣpa dūrvā akṣata ādibhiḥ alam pura kāminībhiḥ
niryāya rāja bhavana antarataḥ sa līlam ānanditaḥ narapatiḥ bahu māna pūrvakam

original: tasmingṛhe nṛpa tadīyapurandhrivargaḥ svāsīnamāśu nṛpatirvividhārhaṇābhiḥ // BndP_2,27.36 //

original: anvāsta rājasamitau vividhairvinodairhṛṣṭaḥ suredra iva devagaṇairupetaḥ /
analyzed: anvāsta rāja samitau vividhaiḥ vinodaiḥ hṛṣṭaḥ suredraḥ iva deva gaṇaiḥ upetaḥ
tatas ciram vividha vādya vinoda nṛtta prekṣā pravṛtta hasana ādi kathā prasaṃgaḥ
āsāṃcakāra
ittham viśām adhipatiḥ bhṛśam ā niśā arddham nānā vihāra vibhava anubhavaiḥ anekaiḥ
sthitvā anugān narapatīn api tad nivāsam prasthāpya vāsa bhavanam svayam api ayāsīt
tat rāja sainyam akhilam nija vīrya śaurya saṃpad prabhāva mahima anuguṇam gṛheṣu
ātma anurupa vibhaveṣu mahārha vastra sraj bhūṣaṇa ādibhiḥ alam muditam babhūva
sainyāni tāni nṛpateḥ vividha anna pāna sat bhakṣya bhojya madhu māṃsa payaḥ ghṛta ādyaiḥ
tṛptāni avātsuḥ akhilāni sukha upabhaugaiḥ tasyām naredra puri deva gaṇāḥ divi iva
evam tadā narapateḥ anuyāyinaḥ te nānāvidha ucita sukha anubhava pratītāḥ

original: anyonyamūcuriti gehadhanādibhirvā kiṃ sādhyate vayamihaiva vasāma sarve /

tat śrutvā bhīḥ abhūt teṣām rāma nāma anukīrttanāt
krodham prasaṅya ānṛśaṃsyam pūrva vairam anusmaran
atha te procuḥ anyonyam pitṛ hantuḥ vadhāt pituḥ

original: vaira niryātanaṃ kiṃ tu kariṣyāmo diśādhunā // BndP_2,45.7 //
analyzed: vaira niryātanam kim tu kariṣyāmaḥ diśā adhunā
iti aktvā khaḍga hastāḥ te saṃpraviśya tad āśramam
prajāghnire prayāteṣu muni vīreṣu sarvatas

original: taṃ hatvāsya śiro hṛtvā niṣādā iva nirdayāḥ /
analyzed: tam hatvā asya śiraḥ hṛtvā niṣādāḥ iva nirdayāḥ

original: prayayuste durātmānaḥ sabalāḥ svapurīṃ prati // BndP_2,45.9 //
analyzed: prayayuḥ te durātmānaḥ sa balāḥ sva purīm prati
putrāḥ tasya mahātmānau dṛṣṭvā sva pitaram hatam

original: bharttāraṃ nihataṃ bhūmau patitaṃ vīkṣya reṇukā /
analyzed: bharttāram nihatam bhūmau patitam vīkṣya reṇukā
papāta mūrcchitā sadyas latā iva aśani tāḍitā
sā sva cetasi saṃmūcchya śoka pāvaka dīpitāḥ
dūra pranaṣṭa saṃjñā iva sadyas prāṇaiḥ vyayujyata

original: anālapantyāṃ tasyāṃ tu saṃjñāṃ yātā hi te punaḥ /
analyzed: an ālapantyām tasyām tu saṃjñām yātāḥ hi te punar
nyapatan mūrcchitāḥ bhūmau nimagnāḥ śoka sāgare
tatas tapodhanāḥ ye nye tad tad povana vāsinaḥ
sametya āśvāsayāmāsuḥ tulya duḥkhāḥ sutān mune
sāṃtvyamānāḥ muni gaṇaiḥ jāmadagnyā yathāvidhi
ādhakṣuḥ vacasā teṣām agnau pitroḥ kalevare
cakruḥ eva tat ūrddhvam vai yat karttavyam anantaram
pitroḥ maraṇa duḥkhena pīḍyamānāḥ divāniśam

original: tataḥ kāle gate rāmaḥ samānāṃ dvādaśāvadhau /
analyzed: tatas kāle gate rāmaḥ samānām dvādaśa avadhau
nivṛttaḥ tapasaḥ sakhyā saha agāt āśramam pituḥ

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge sagaropākhyāne
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyu prokte madhyama bhāge sagara upākhyāne
bhārgavacarite pañcacatvāriṃśattamaḥ adhyāyaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca
sa gacchan pathi śuśrāva munibhyaḥ ta ttvam āditas
rāja putra vyavasitam svargatim eva ca
pituḥ tu jīva haraṇam śiraḥ haraṇam eva ca

original: tanmṛtereva maraṇaṃ śrutvā mātuśca kevalam // BndP_2,46.2 //
analyzed: tad mṛteḥ eva maraṇam śrutvā mātuḥ ca kevalam
vilalāpa mahā bāhuḥ duḥkha śoka samanvitaḥ
tam atha āśvāsayāmāsa tulya duḥkhaḥ kṛta vraṇaḥ
hetubhiḥ śāstra nirdiṣṭaiḥ vīrya sāmarthya sūcakaiḥ
yukti laukika dṛṣṭāntaiḥ tad śokam saṃvyaśāmayat
sāṃtvitaḥ tena maidhāvī dhṛtim ālaṃbya bhārgavaḥ

original: prayayau sahitaḥ sakhyā bhrātṝṇāṃ tu didṛkṣayā // BndP_2,46.5 //
analyzed: prayayau sahitaḥ sakhyā bhrātṝṇām tu didṛkṣayā
sa tān dṛṣṭvā abhivādya etān duḥkhitān duḥkha karśitaḥ
śokāmaṣa yutaḥ taiḥ ca saha dina trayam
tatas sya sumāhān krodhaḥ smarataḥ nidhanam pituḥ
babhūva sahasā sarva loka saṃharaṇa kṣamaḥ
mātuḥ arthe kṛtām pūrvam pratijñām satya saṃgaraḥ
dṛḍhīcakāra hṛdaye sarva kṣatra vadha udyataḥ
kṣatra vaṃśyān aśeṣeṇa hatvā tad deha lohitaiḥ

original: kariṣye tarpaṇaṃ pitroriti niścitya bhārgavaḥ // BndP_2,46.9 //
analyzed: kariṣye tarpaṇam pitroḥ iti niścitya bhārgavaḥ

original: prayayau tadanujñātaḥ kṛtvā saṃsthāṃpituḥ kriyām // BndP_2,46.10 //
analyzed: prayayau tad anujñātaḥ kṛtvā saṃsthām pituḥ kriyām

original: tadbāhyopavane sthitvā sasmāra sa mahodaram // BndP_2,46.11 //
analyzed: tad bāhya upavane sthitvā sasmāra sa mahodaram
sa tasmai ratha cāpa ādyam sahasā aśva samanvitam
preṣayāmāsa rāmāya sarva saṃhananāni ca
rāmaḥ pi ratham āruhya sannaddhaḥ sa śaram dhanuḥ
gṛhītvā apūrayat śaṅkham rudradattam amitra jit

original: sahasāhotha sārathyaṃ cakre sārathināṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,46.14 //
analyzed: sahasā aha utha sārathyam cakre sārathinām varaḥ
ratha jyā śaṅkha nādaiḥ tu vadhāt pitroḥ amarṣiṇaḥ
tasya abhūt nagarī sarvā saṃkṣubdhāḥ ca nara dvipāḥ
rāmam tu āgatam ājñāya sarva kṣatra kula antakam
saṃkṣubdhāḥ cakruḥ udyogam saṃgrāmāya nṛpa ātmajāḥ
atha pañca rathāḥ śurāḥ śūrasena ādayaḥ nṛpa

original: rāmeṇa yoddhuṃ sahitā rājabhiśca krurudyamam // BndP_2,46.17 //
analyzed: rāmeṇa yoddhum sahitāḥ rājabhiḥ ca kruḥ udyamam
catur aṅga vala upetāḥ tatas te kṣatriya ṛṣabhāḥ
rāmam āsādayāmāsuḥ pataṅgāḥ iva pāvakam
nivārya tān āpatataḥ rathena ekena bhārgavaḥ
yuyudhe pārthivaiḥ sarvaiḥ samare mita vikramaḥ
tatas punar abhūt yuddham rāmasya saha rājabhiḥ

original: jaghāna yatra saṃkruddho rājñāṃ śatamudāradhīḥ // BndP_2,46.20 //
analyzed: jaghāna yatra saṃkruddhaḥ rājñām śatam udāra dhīḥ
tatas sa śūrasena ādīn hatvā sa bala vāhanān
traṇena pātayāmāsa kṣitau kṣatriya maṇḍalam
tatas te bhagna saṃkalpāḥ hata sva bala vāhanāḥ
hata śiṣṭāḥ nṛpatayaḥ dudruvuḥ sarvatodiśam

original: evaṃ vidrāvya sainyāni hatvā jitvātha saṃyuge /
analyzed: evam vidrāvya sainyāni hatvā jitvā atha saṃyuge
jaghāna śataśas rājñaḥ śūrān śara vara agninā
tatas krodha parīta ātmā dagdhu kāmaḥ khilām purīm
udairayat bhārgavaḥ stram kālāgni sadṛśa prabham
jvālā kavalita aśeṣa pura prākāra mālinīm
purīm sa hasti aśva narām sa dadāha astra pāvakaḥ
dahyamānām purīm dṛṣṭvā prāṇa trāṇa parāyaṇaḥ
jīvanāya jagāma āśu vītihotraḥ bhaya āturaḥ

original: astrāgninā purīṃ sarvāṃ dagdhvā hatvā ca śātravān /
analyzed: astra agninā purīm sarvām dagdhvā hatvā ca śātravān
khilān lokān sākṣāt kālaḥ iva antakaḥ
akṛta vraṇa saṃyuktaḥ sahasāhena ca anvitaḥ
jagāma ratha ghoṣeṇa kaṃpayan iva medinīm
vinighnan kṣatriyān sarvān saṃśāmya pṛthivī tale
mahendra adrim yayau rāmaḥ tapase dhata mānasaḥ
tasmin aṣṭa catuṣkam ca yāvat kṣatra samudgamam
pratyetya bhūyas tad hatyai baddha dīkṣaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ
kṣatra kṣetreṣu bhūyas ca kṣatram utpāditam dvijaiḥ
nijaghāna punar bhūmau rājña śata sahasraśas
varṣa dvayena kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyām mahīm
ṣaṣ catuṣṭaya varṣa antam tapaḥ tepe punar ca saḥ
bhūyas pi rājan saṃbuddham kṣatram utpāditam dvijaiḥ

original: jaghāna bhūmau niḥśeṣaṃ sākṣātkāla ivāntakaḥ // BndP_2,46.33 //
analyzed: jaghāna bhūmau niḥśeṣam sākṣāt kālaḥ iva antakaḥ
kālena tāvatā bhūyas samutpannam nṛpāt tu ayam
nighnan cacāra pṛthivīm varṣa dvayam anāratam

original: alaṃ rāmeṇa rājendra smaratā nidhanaṃ pituḥ /
analyzed: alam rāmeṇa rāja indra smaratā nidhanam pituḥ

original: triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivī tena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā // BndP_2,46.35 //
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas pṛthivī tena niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā
tris sapta kṛtvas tad mātā yat uraḥ svam atāḍayat

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite ṣaṭcatvāriṃśatta mo 'dhyāyaḥ // 46//
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyu prokte madhyama bhāge tṛtīye upoddhāta pāde bhārgavacarite ṣaṭcatvāriṃśatta maḥ dhyāyaḥ
vasiṣṭhaḥ uvāca
tatas mūrddhābhiṣiktānām rājñām amita tejasām
ṣaṣ sahasra dvayam rāmaḥ jīva grāham gṛhītavān

original: sa jagāma mahātejāḥ kurukṣetraṃ tapomayam // BndP_2,47.2 //
analyzed: sa jagāma mahā tejāḥ kurukṣetram tapaḥ mayam

original: sarāṃsi tāni vai pañca pūrayāmāsa bhārgavaḥ // BndP_2,47.4 //
analyzed: sarāṃsi tāni vai pañca pūrayāmāsa bhārgavaḥ
snātvā teṣu yathānyāyam jāmadagnayaḥ pratāpavān

original: brāhmaṇaiḥ saha mātuśca tatra cakre yathoditam // BndP_2,47.6 //

evam tīrṇa pratīkaḥ sa kurukṣetre tapaḥ maye

vihitam jāmadagnyena kurukṣetre tapaḥ vane

original: yatra yakre bhṛguśreṣṭhaḥ pitṝṇāṃ tṛptimakṣayām // BndP_2,47.9 //
analyzed: yatra yakre bhṛgu śreṣṭhaḥ pitṝṇām tṛptim akṣayām

original: samantapañcakaṃ nāma tīrthaṃ loke pariśrutam // BndP_2,47.11 //

original: martyānāṃ yatra yātānāmenāṃsi nikhilāni tu // BndP_2,47.12 //

tad kṣetra caryā gamanam martyānām asatām iha
na labhyate mahā rāja jātu janma śataiḥ api

original: yatra snātaḥ sarvatīrthaiḥ snāto bhavati mānavaḥ /

original: tataḥ saṃvatsarasyānte brāhmaṇaiḥ sahito vaśī // BndP_2,47.16 //

original: tato gatvā tataḥ śrāddhe yathāśāstramarindamaḥ // BndP_2,47.17 //

original: śaivaṃ tatra paraṃ sthānaṃ candrapādamiti smṛtam // BndP_2,47.18 //
analyzed: śaivam tatra param sthānam candrapādam iti smṛtam

pitṝn uddiśya tatra asau tarppiteṣu dvijātiṣu
dadau ca vidhivat piṇḍam pitṛ bhakti samanvitaḥ

jagṛhuḥ tad kṛtām pūjām jamadagni purogamāḥ
atha saṃprīta manasaḥ sametya bhṛgunandanam
ūcuḥ tat pitaraḥ sarve dṛśyāḥ bhūtvā antarikṣa gāḥ

original: mahatkarma kṛtaṃ vīra bhavatānyaiḥ suduṣkaram // BndP_2,47.23 //

original: kṣetrasyāsya prabhāveṇa bhaktyā ca tava darśanam // BndP_2,47.25 //

analyzed: tapase dhṛta saṃkalpaḥ babhūva sa mahā manāḥ

kāśyapāya dadau sarva amṛte tam śailam uttamam

original: ātmanaḥ sannivāsārthaṃ taṃ rāmaḥ paryakalpayat // BndP_2,47.54 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ sannivāsa artham tam rāmaḥ paryakalpayat
tatas prabhṛti rāja indra pūjayāmāsa śāstrataḥ
hiraṇya ratna vastra śva go gaja anna ādibhiḥ tathā
purā samāpya yajña ante tathā ca avabhṛtha āplutaḥ
cakre dravya parityāgam teṣām anumate tadā
dattvā ca sarva bhūtānām abhayam bhṛgunandanaḥ
tatra api parvata vare tapaḥ cartum samārabhat
tatas tam samanujñāya sadasyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ tathā
yayuḥ yathāgatam sarve munayaḥ śaṃsita vratāḥ
gateṣu teṣu bhagavān akṛtavraṇa saṃyutaḥ
tapaḥ mahat samāsthāya tatra eva nyavasat sukhī
kāśyapī tu tatas bhūmiḥ jananāthāḥ hi anekaśas
sarva duḥkha praśānti artham mārīca anumatena tu
tatra dīpa pratiṣṭhā ākhya vratam viṣṇu mukha uditam

original: cacāra dharaṇī samyak dukhairḥmuktābhavacca sā // BndP_2,47.61 //
analyzed: cacāra dharaṇī samyak dukhaiḥ ḥmuktā abhavat ca sā
iti eṣa jāmadagnyasya prādurbhāvaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
yasmin śrute naraḥ sarva pātakaiḥ vipramucyate
prabhāvaḥ kārttavīryasya loke prathita tejasaḥ
prasaṃgāt kathitaḥ samyak na ati saṃkṣepa vistaraḥ
evaṃprabhāvaḥ sa nṛpaḥ kārttavīryaḥ bhavat bhuvi

original: na tādṛśaḥ pumātkaścidbhāvī bhūtāthavā śrutaḥ // BndP_2,47.64 //
analyzed: na tādṛśaḥ pumāt kaścid bhāvī bhūta athavā śrutaḥ
dattātreyāt varam vavre mṛtim uttama pūruṣāt

original: yatpurā so 'gamanmuktiṃ raṇe rāmeṇa ghātitaḥ // BndP_2,47.65 //
analyzed: yat purā saḥ gamat muktim raṇe rāmeṇa ghātitaḥ
tasya āsīt pañcamaḥ putraḥ yaḥ jayadhvajaḥ
putraḥ tasya mahā bāhuḥ tālajaṅghaḥ bhavat nṛpa
abhūt tasya api putrāṇām śatam uttama dhanvinām
tālajaṅgha abhidhāḥ yeṣām vītihotraḥ grajaḥ bhavat
putraiḥ sa vītihotra ādyaiḥ haihaya ādyaiḥ ca rājabhiḥ
kālam mahāntam avasat hima adri vāna gahvare
yaḥ pūrvam rāma bāṇena dravan pṛṣṭhe bhitāḍitaḥ
patat bhūmau mūrchitaḥ gāḍha vedanaḥ
dadarśa vītihotraḥ tam dravan daiva vaśāt iva
ratham āropya vegena palāyana paraḥ bhavat
te tatra nyavasan sarve himādrau bhaya pīḍitāḥ
kṛcchram mahāntam āsādya śāka mūla phala aśanaḥ
tatas śāntim gate rāme tapasi āsakta mānase

original: jālajaṅghaḥ svakaṃ rājyaṃ saputraḥ pratyapadyata // BndP_2,47.72 //
analyzed: jālajaṅghaḥ svakam rājyam sa putraḥ pratyapadyata
sanniveśya purīm bhūyas pūrvavat nṛpa sattamaḥ
vasan tadā nijam rājyam āpālayat arindamaḥ
su putraḥ sa anuga balaḥ pūrva vairam anusmaran

original: abhyāyayau mahārāja tālajaṅghaḥ puraṃ tava // BndP_2,47.74 //
analyzed: abhyāyayau mahā rāja tālajaṅghaḥ puram tava
caturaṅga bala upetaḥ kaṃpayan iva medinīm
ruroda abhyetya nagarīm ayodhyām sa mahīpatiḥ
tatas niṣkramya nagarāt phalagutantraḥ pi te pitā

original: yuyudhe tairnṛpaiḥ sarvairvṛddho 'pi taruṇo yathā // BndP_2,47.76 //
analyzed: yuyudhe taiḥ nṛpaiḥ sarvaiḥ vṛddhaḥ pi taruṇaḥ yathā
nihata aneka mātaga turaṅga ratha sainikaḥ
śatrubhiḥ nirjitaḥ vṛddhaḥ palāyana paraḥ bhavat
tyaktvā sa nagaram rājyam sa kośa bala vāhanam

original: antarvatnyā ca te mātrā sahito vanamāviśat // BndP_2,47.78 //
analyzed: antarvatnyā ca te mātrā sahitaḥ vanam āviśat
tatra caurva āśrama upānte nivasan acirāt iva
śoka amarṣa samāviṣṭaḥ vṛddha bhāvena ca svayam
vilokyamānaḥ mātrā te bāṣpa gadgada kaṇṭhayā

original: anātha iva rājendra svargalokamito gataḥ // BndP_2,47.80 //
analyzed: anāthaḥ iva rāja indra svarga lokam itas gataḥ
tatas te jananī rājan duḥkha śoka samanvitā
citām āropayat bhartuḥ rudatī sā kalevaram
anaśana ādi duḥkhena bharttuḥ vyasana karśitā
cakāra agni praveśāya su dṛḍhām matim ātmanaḥ
aurvaḥ tat akhilam śrutvā svayam eva mahā muniḥ
nirgatya ca āśramāt tām ca vārayan idam abravīt

original: na marttavyaṃ tvayā rājñi sāṃprataṃ jaṭhare tava /
analyzed: na marttavyam tvayā rājñi sāṃpratam jaṭhare tava
putraḥ tiṣṭhati sarveṣām pravaraḥ cavarttinām

original: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā mātā tava manasvinī /
analyzed: iti tat vacanam śrutvā mātā tava manasvinī
virarāma mṛteḥ tām tu muniḥ sva āśramam ānayat

original: tataḥ sā sarvaduḥkhāni niyamya tvanmukhāṃbujam // BndP_2,47.85 //
analyzed: tatas sā sarva duḥkhāni niyamya tvad mukha aṃbujam
didṛkṣuḥ āśrama upānte tasya eva nyavasat sukham

original: suṣāva ca tataḥ kāle sā tvāmaurvāśrame tadā // BndP_2,47.86 //
analyzed: suṣāva ca tatas kāle sā tvām aurva āśrame tadā
jātakarma ādikam sarvam bhavataḥ saḥ karot muniḥ
aurva āśrame vivṛddhaḥ ca bhavān tena anukaṃpitaḥ
tvayā eva viditam sarvam atas param arindama
evam prabhāvaḥ nṛpatiḥ kārttavīryaḥ bhavat bhuvi
vratasya asya prabhāveṇa sarva lokeṣu viśrutaḥ

original: yadvaṃśajairjito yuddhe pitā te vanamādiśat // BndP_2,47.89 //
analyzed: yat vaṃśa jaiḥ jitaḥ yuddhe pitā te vanam ādiśat
tad vṛttāntam aśeṣeṇa mayā te samudīritam
etat ca sarvam ākhyātam vratānām uttamam tava
sa mantra tantram lokeṣu sarva loka phala pradam
na hi asya karttuḥ nṛpateḥ puruṣa artha catuṣṭaye
bhavati abhīpsitam kiñcid darllabham bhuvanatraye
saṃkṣepeṇa mayā ākhyātam vratam haihaya bhūbhujaḥ

original: jāmadagnyasya ca mune kimanyatkathayāmi te // BndP_2,47.92 //
analyzed: jāmadagnyasya ca mune kim anyat kathayāmi te
jaiminiḥ uvāca

original: tataḥ sa sagaro rājā kṛtāñjalipuṭo munim // BndP_2,47.93 //
analyzed: tatas sa sagaraḥ rājā kṛta añjali puṭaḥ munim
uvāca bhagavan etat kartum icchāmi aham vratam
samyak tam upadeśena tatra anujñām prayaccha me
karmaṇā anena viprarṣe kṛtārthaḥ smi na saṃśayaḥ
iti uktaḥ tena rājñā tu tathā iti uktvā mahā muniḥ
dīkṣayāmāsa rājānam śastra uktena eva vartmanā

original: sa dīkṣito vasiṣṭhena sagaro rājasattamaḥ // BndP_2,47.96 //
analyzed: sa dīkṣitaḥ vasiṣṭhena sagaraḥ rāja sattamaḥ
dravyāṇi ānīya vidhivat pracacāra śubha vratam

original: pūjayitvā jagannāthaṃ vidhinā tena pārthivaḥ // BndP_2,47.97 //
analyzed: pūjayitvā jagannātham vidhinā tena pārthivaḥ
samāpya ca yathāyogyam anujñāya gurum tatas
pratijñām akarot rājā vratam etat anuttamam
ājīva antam dhariṣyāmi yatnena iti mahāmatiḥ
athā anujñāpya rājānam vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
san nivartya anugacchantam prajagāma nija āśramam

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde sagaropākhyāne vasiṣṭhagamanaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyu prokte madhyama bhāge tṛtīye upoddhāta pāde sagaropākhyāne vasiṣṭhagamanam nāma saptacatvāriṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
jaiminiḥ uvāca
gate tasmin muni vare sagaraḥ rāja sattamaḥ
ayodhyāyām adhivasn pālayāmāsa medinīm
vayasā eva sa bālaḥ bhūt karmaṇā vṛddha saṃmataḥ

original: tathāpi na divā bhukteṃ śete vā niśi saṃsmaran /
analyzed: tathā api na divā śete vā niśi saṃsmaran
su dīrgham niḥśvasiti uṣṇam udvigna hṛdayaḥ niśam

original: śrutvā rājā svarājyaṃ nijagurumavajityāribhiḥ saṃgṛhītaṃ mātrā sārddhaṃ prayāntaṃ vanamatigahanaṃsvargataṃ taṃ ca tasmin /
analyzed: śrutvā rājā sva rājyam nija gurum avajitya aribhiḥ saṃgṛhītam mātrā sārddham prayāntam vanam ati gahanam svargatam tam ca tasmin

original: śokāviṣṭaḥ saroṣaṃ sakalaripukulocchittaye satpratijñaścake sadyaḥ pratijñāṃ paribhavamanalaṃ soḍhumikṣvākuvaṃśyaḥ // BndP_2,48.4 //
analyzed: śoka āviṣṭaḥ sa roṣam sakala ripu kula ucchittaye sat pratijñaḥ cake sadyas pratijñām paribhavam analam soḍhum ikṣvāku vaṃśyaḥ
sa kadācid mahīpālaḥ kṛta kautukamaṅgalaḥ

original: ripuṃ jetuṃ manaścakre diśaśca sakalāḥ kramāt // BndP_2,48.5 //
analyzed: ripum jetum manaḥ cakre diśaḥ ca sakalāḥ kramāt
aneka ratha sāhasraiḥ gaja aśva ratha sainikaiḥ

original: sarvataḥ saṃvṛto rājā niścakrāma purottamāt // BndP_2,48.6 //
analyzed: sarvatas saṃvṛtaḥ rājā niścakrāma pura uttamāt
śatrūn hantum pratasthe nija bala nivahena utpatadbhiḥ turaṅgaiḥ nā asattva ūrmi jāla ākula jalanidhi nibhena atha ṣāḍaṅgikena

original: mattairmātaṅgayūthaiḥ sakulagirikulenaiva bhūmaṇḍalena śvetacchatradhvajaughairapi śaśisukarābhātakhenaiva sārddham // BndP_2,48.7 //
analyzed: mattaiḥ mātaṅga yūthaiḥ sa kula giri kulena eva bhū maṇḍalena śveta chatra dhvaja oghaiḥ api śaśi sukara ābhāta khena eva sārddham
tasya agresara sainya yūtha caraṇa prakṣuṇṇa śaila uccaya kṣoda āpūrita nimna bhāgam avanīpālasya saṃyāsyataḥ
pratyekam caturaṅga sainya nikara prakṣoda saṃbhūta bhū reṇu prāvṛtiḥ utsthalī samabhavat bhūmiḥ tu tatra aniśam
nighnan dṛptān anekān dvipa turaga ratha vyūha saṃbhinna vīrān sadyas śobhām dadhānaḥ sura nikara camūḥ nighnataḥ candramauliḥ

original: dūrādevābhiśaṃsannarinagaranirodheṣu karmābhiṣaṅge teṣāṃ śīghrāpayānakṣaṇamabhidiśati prāṇidhairyaṃ vidhatte // BndP_2,48.9 //
analyzed: dūrāt eva abhiśaṃsan ari nagara nirodheṣu karma abhiṣaṅge teṣām śīghrāpayāna kṣaṇam abhidiśati prāṇi dhairyam vidhatte
vijigīṣuḥ diśaḥ rājā rājñaḥ yasya abhiyāsyati
viṣayam sa nṛpaḥ tasya sadyas praṇatim eṣyati
vijitya nṛpatīn sarvān kṛtvā ca sva padānugān
saṃketa gāminaḥ kāṃścid kṛtvā rājye nyavarttata

original: evaṃ sa visarandikṣu dakṣiṇābhimukho nṛpaḥ // BndP_2,48.12 //
analyzed: evam sa visaran dikṣu dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ nṛpaḥ
smaran pūrva kṛtam vairam haihayān abhyavarttata
tatas tasya nṛpaiḥ sārddham samagra ratha kuñjaraiḥ
babhūva haihayaiḥ vīraiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ roma harṣaṇaḥ

original: rājñāṃ yatra sahasrāṇi sa balāni mahāhave // BndP_2,48.14 //
analyzed: rājñām yatra sahasrāṇi sa balāni mahā āhave
nijaghāna mahā bāhuḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kosala īśvaraḥ

original: jitvā haihayabhūpālānbhaṅktvā dagdhvā ca tatpurīm // BndP_2,48.15 //
analyzed: jitvā haihaya bhūpālān bhaṅktvā dagdhvā ca tad purīm
niḥśeṣa śūnyāḥ makarot vaira anta karaṇaḥ nṛpaḥ
samagra bala saṃmardda pramṛṣṭa aśeṣa bhū talaḥ
haihayānām aśeṣam tu cakre rājyam rajaḥ samam

original: rājyaṃ purīṃ cāpahāya bhraṣṭaiśvaryā hatatviṣaḥ // BndP_2,48.17 //
analyzed: rājyam purīm ca apahāya bhraṣṭa aiśvaryāḥ hata tviṣaḥ
rājānaḥ hata bhūyiṣṭhāḥ vyadravanta samantataḥ
abhidrutya nṛpān tān tu dravamāṇān mahīpatiḥ
jaghāna sa anugān mattaḥ prajāḥ kruddhaḥ iva antakaḥ
tatas tān prati sa krodhaḥ sagaraḥ samare rihā
mumoca astram mahā raudram bhārgavam rīpu bhīṣaṇam
tena utsṛṣṭa ati raudra tribhuvana bhaya da prasphurat bhārgava astra jvālā dandahyamāna avaśa tanu tatayaḥ te nṛpāḥ sā adya eva
vāyu astra āvṛtta dhūma udgama paṭala tamaḥ muṣṭa dṛṣṭi prasārāḥ bhremuḥ bhū pṛṣṭa loṭhat bahula tamaḥ rajaḥ gūḍha mātrāḥ muhūrttam

original: āganeyāstrapratāpapratihatagatayo 'dṛṣṭamārgāḥ samantā dbhūpālā naṣṭasaṃghāḥ paravaśatanavo vyākulībhūtacittāḥ /
analyzed: āganeya astra pratāpa pratihata gatayaḥ dṛṣṭa mārgāḥ samantāt dbhūpālāḥ naṣṭa saṃghāḥ para vaśa tanavaḥ vyākulībhūta cittāḥ

original: bhītāḥ saṃtyuktavastrāyudhakavacavibhūṣādikā muktakeśā vispaṣṭonmattabhāvānbhṛśa taramanukurvantyagrataḥ śātravāṇām // BndP_2,48.21 //
analyzed: bhītāḥ saṃtyukta vastra āyudha kavaca vibhūṣā ādikāḥ mukta keśāḥ vispaṣṭa unmatta bhāvān bhṛśa taram anukurvanti agratas śātravāṇām
vijitya haihayān sarvān samare sagaraḥ balī
saṃkṣubdha sāgara ākāraḥ kāṃbojān abhyavarttata
nānā vāditra ghoṣa āhata paṭaha rava ākarṇana dhvasta dhairyāḥ sadyas saṃtyakta rājya sva bala pura purandhrī samūhāḥ vimūḍhāḥ

original: kāṃbojāstālajaṅghāḥ śakayavanakirātādayaḥ sākamete bhremurbhūryastrabhītyā diśi diśi ripavo yasya pūrvāparādhāḥ // BndP_2,48.23 //
analyzed: kāṃbojāḥ tālajaṅghāḥ śaka yavana kirāta ādayaḥ sākam ete bhremuḥ bhūri astra bhītyā diśi diśi ripavaḥ yasya pūrva aparādhāḥ

original: bhītāstasya nareśvarasya ripavaḥ kecitpratā pānalajvālāmuṣṭadṛśo visṛjya vasatiṃ rājyaṃ ca putrādibhiḥ /
analyzed: bhītāḥ tasya nareśvarasya ripavaḥ visṛjya vasatim rājyam ca putra ādibhiḥ

original: dviṭsainyaiḥ samabhidrutā vanabhuvaṃ saṃprāpya tatrāpi te 'staimityaṃ samupāgatā giriguhāsuptotthitena dviṣaḥ // BndP_2,48.24 //
analyzed: dviṣ sainyaiḥ samabhidrutāḥ vana bhuvam saṃprāpya tatra api te staimityam samupāgatāḥ giri guhā supta utthitena dviṣaḥ
tālajaṅghān nihatya ājau rājā sa bala vāhanān
krameṇa nāśayāmāsa tat rājyam arikarṣaṇaḥ
tatas yavana kāṃboja kirāta ādīn anekaśas
nijaghāna ruṣā āviṣṭaḥ palhavān pāradān api
hanyamānāḥ tu te sarve rājānaḥ tena saṃyuge

original: dudruvuḥ saṃghaśo bhītā hataśiṣṭāḥ samantataḥ // BndP_2,48.27 //
analyzed: dudruvuḥ saṃghaśas bhītāḥ hata śiṣṭāḥ samantataḥ

original: yuṣmābhiryasya rājyaṃ bahubhirapatdṛtaṃ tasya putro 'dhunāhaṃ hantuṃ vaḥ sapratijñaṃ prasabhamupagato vairaniryātanaiṣī /
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ yasya rājyam bahubhiḥ apatdṛtam tasya putraḥ dhuna aham hantum vaḥ sa pratijñam prasabham upagataḥ vaira niryātana eṣī

original: ityuccaiḥ śrāvayāṇo yudhi nijacaritaṃ vairibhirnāgavīryaḥ kṣatrairvidhvaṃsitejāḥ sagaranarapatiḥ smārayāmāsa bhūpaḥ // BndP_2,48.28 //
analyzed: iti uccais śrāvayāṇaḥ yudhi nija caritam vairibhiḥ nāga vīryaḥ kṣatraiḥ vidhvaṃsi tejāḥ sagara narapatiḥ smārayāmāsa bhūpaḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājavaryaṃ sakalaripukulaprakṣayopāttadīkṣaṃ bhītāḥ strībālapūrvaṃ śaraṇamabhiyayuḥ svāsusarakṣaṇāya /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā rāja varyam sakala ripu kula prakṣaya upātta dīkṣam bhītāḥ strī bāla pūrvam śaraṇam abhiyayuḥ sva asu sarakṣaṇāya

original: ikṣvākūṇāṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ kulagurumabhitaḥ sapta rājñāṃ kaleṣu prakhyātāḥ saṃprasūtā nṛpavararipavaḥ pāradāḥ palhavādyāḥ // BndP_2,48.29 //
analyzed: ikṣvākūṇām vasiṣṭham kula gurum abhitas sapta rājñām kaleṣu prakhyātāḥ saṃprasūtāḥ nṛpa vara ripavaḥ pāradāḥ palhava ādyāḥ
vasiṣṭham āśrama upānte vasaṃtam ṛṣibhiḥ vṛtam
upagamya abruvan sarve kṛta añjali puṭāḥ nṛpāḥ
śaraṇam naḥ brahman ārttānām abhaya eṣiṇām
sagara astra agni nirdagdha śarīrāṇām mumūrṣatām
sa hanti asamāna śeṣeṇa vaira anta karaṇa unmukhaḥ
tasmāt bhayāt hi niṣkrāntāḥ vayam jīvita kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
vibhinna rājya bhoga ṛddhi sva dāra apatya bāndhavāḥ

original: kevalaṃ prāṇarakṣārthaṃ tvāṃ tvayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // BndP_2,48.33 //
analyzed: kevalam prāṇa rakṣā artham tvām tu ayam śaraṇam gataḥ

original: na hyanyo 'sti pumāṃlloke sauhṛdena balena vā /
analyzed: na hi anyaḥ sti pumān loke sauhṛdena balena vā
yaḥ tam nivarttayitvā asmān pālayet mahataḥ bhayāt
tvam kila arka anvaya bhuvām rājñām kula guruḥ vṛtaḥ
tad vaṃśa pūrvajaiḥ bhūpaiḥ tu ata prabhāvaḥ ca tādṛśaḥ

analyzed: siddhi kāmāḥ vasaṃti sma munayaḥ tatra kecana
kāma krodha vinirmuktāḥ ye tasmin vīta matsarāḥ
nivasaṃti acireṇa eva tad siddhim prāpnuvanti hi
japa homa ratāḥ śāntāḥ nipatāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: vasaṃti tasminye te hi siddhiṃ prāpsyantyabhīpsitām // BndP_2,56.19 //
analyzed: vasaṃti tasmin ye te hi siddhim prāpsyanti abhīpsitām
dāna homa japa ādyam vai pitṛ deva dvija arcanam
anyasmāt koṭi guṇitam bhavet tasmin phalam nṛpa
aṃbhodhi salile tasmin kṣetre tipāvane
mahatā tapasā yuktāḥ munayaḥ tad nivāsinaḥ
sahyam śikhariṇam śreṣṭham nilaya artham samāruhan

original: vasaṃtastatra te sarve saṃpradhārya parasparam // BndP_2,56.22 //
analyzed: vasaṃtaḥ tatra te sarve saṃpradhārya parasparam
saha indrādrau tapasyantam rāmam gantum pracakramuḥ
rājā uvāca
agastya pīta toye bdhau paritas rāja nandanaiḥ
khātvā adhas pātite kṣetre sa tīrtha āśrama kānane
bhū bhāgeṣu tathā anyeṣu puragra mākara ādiṣu
vināśiteṣu deśeṣu samudra upānta varttiṣu
kim akārṣuḥ muni śreṣṭha janāḥ tad nilayāḥ tatas
tatra eva ca avasan kṛcchrāt prasthitān yatra vā tatas
kiyatā ca eva kālena saṃpūrṇaḥ bhūt apāṃnidhiḥ

original: kena vāpi prakāreṇa brahmannetadvadasva me // BndP_2,56.26 //
analyzed: kena vā api prakāreṇa brahman etat vadasva me
jaiminiḥ uvāca
anūpeṣu pradeśeṣu nāśiteṣu durātmabhiḥ
janāḥ tad nilayāḥ sarve saṃprayātāḥ itas tatas
tatra eva ca avasan kṛcchrāt kecid kṣetra nivāsinaḥ
etasmin eva kāle tu rājan aṃśumataḥ sutaḥ

original: babhūva bhuvidharmātmā dilīpa iti viśrutaḥ // BndP_2,56.29 //
analyzed: babhūva bhuvi dharma ātmā dilīpaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
rājye bhiṣicya tam samyak bhukta bhoga uṃśumān nṛpaḥ

original: vanaṃ jagāma medhāvī tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ // BndP_2,56.30 //
analyzed: vanam jagāma medhāvī tapase dhṛta mānasaḥ
dilīpaḥ tu tatas śrīmān aśeṣām pṛthivīm imām
pālayāmāsa dharmeṇa vijitya sakalān arīn
bhagīrathaḥ nāma sutaḥ tasya āsīt loka viśrutaḥ
sarva dharma artha kuśalaḥ śrīmān amita vikramaḥ

original: rājye 'bhiṣicya taṃ rājā dilīpo 'pi vanaṃ yayau /
analyzed: rājye bhiṣicya tam rājā dilīpaḥ pi vanam yayau
sa ca api pālayan urvīm samyak vihata kaṇṭakām
mumude vividhaiḥ bhogaiḥ divi devapatiḥ yathā

original: sa śuśrāvātmanaḥ pūrvaṃ pūrvajānāṃ mahīpatiḥ // BndP_2,56.34 //
analyzed: sa śuśrāva ātmanaḥ pūrvam pūrvajānām mahīpatiḥ
niraye patanam ghoram viprakopa samudbhavam
brahmadaṇḍa hatān sarvān pitan śrutvā ati duḥkhitaḥ

original: rājye bandhuṣu bhoge vā nirvedaṃ paramaṃ yayau /
analyzed: rājye bandhuṣu bhoge vā nirvedam paramam yayau

original: sa mantripravare rājyaṃ vinyasya tapase vanam // BndP_2,56.36 //
analyzed: sa mantri pravare rājyam vinyasya tapase vanam
prayayau sva pitṝn nākam ninīṣuḥ nṛpa sattamaḥ
tapasā mahātā pūrvam āyuṣe kamala udbhavam
ārādhya tasmāt lebhe ca yāvat āyuḥ nija īpsitam

original: tato gaṅgāṃ mahārāja samārādhya prasādya ca // BndP_2,56.38 //
analyzed: tatas gaṅgām mahā rāja samārādhya prasādya ca
varam āgamanam vavre divaḥ tasyāḥ mahīṃprati
tatas tām śirasā tapasā ārādhayat śivam

original: sa cāpi tadvaraṃ tasmai pradadau bhaktavatsalaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca api tad varam tasmai pradadau bhakta vatsalaḥ

original: merormūrdhnastato gaṅgāṃ pataṃ tī śirasātmanaḥ // BndP_2,56.40 //
analyzed: meroḥ mūrdhnaḥ tatas gaṅgām patam tī śirasā ātmanaḥ
sa grāha nakra makarām jagrāha jagatām patiḥ
sā tat śiraḥ samāsādya mahā vega pravāhinī
tad jaṭā maṇḍale śubhre vililye sā ati gahvare
culaka udaka vat śaṃbhoḥ vilīnām śirasi prabhoḥ
vilokya tad pramokṣāya punar ārādhayat haram

original: sa tāṃ śarvaprasādena labdhvā tu bhuvamāgatām // BndP_2,56.43 //
analyzed: sa tām śarva prasādena labdhvā tu bhuvam āgatām

original: āninye sāgarā dagdhā yatra tāṃ vai diśaṃ prati /
analyzed: āninye sāgarāḥ dagdhāḥ yatra tām vai diśam prati
sanuvrajantī rājānam rājarṣeḥ yajataḥ pathi
tad yajña vāṭam akhilam plāvayāmāsa sarvatas

original: sa tu rājaṛṣiḥ kruddho yajñavāṭe 'khile tayā // BndP_2,56.45 //
analyzed: sa tu rāja ṛṣiḥ kruddhaḥ yajña vāṭe khile tayā
magne gaṇḍūṣa jala vat sa papau tām aśeṣatas

original: atandrito varṣaśataṃ śuśrūṣitavā sa taṃ punaḥ // BndP_2,56.46 //
analyzed: atandritaḥ varṣa śatam sa tam punar
tasmāt prasannāt nṛpatiḥ leme gaṅgām mahātmanaḥ
uṣitvā su ciram jaṭharāt yatas
prathitam jāhnavī iti asyāḥ tatas nāma abhavat bhuvi
bhagīratha anugāḥ bhūtvā tad pitṝṇām aśeṣatas
nija aṃbhasā asthi bhasmāni siṣeca suranimnagā
tatas tad aṃbhasā sikteṣu asthi bhasmasu tad kṣaṇāt
nirayāt sāgarāḥ sarve naṣṭa pāpāḥ divam yayuḥ

original: evaṃ sā sāgarānsarvāndivaṃ nītvā mahāndī // BndP_2,56.50 //
analyzed: evam sā sāgarān sarvān divam nītvā mahāndī
tena eva mārgeṇa javāt prayātā pūrva sāgaram
senoḥ mūrdhnaḥ catur bhedā bhūtvā yātā caturddiśam
catur bheda tayā ca abhūt tasyāḥ nāmnām catuṣṭayam
sītā ca alakanandā ca sucakṣuḥ bhadravatī api
agastya pīta salilāt ciram śuṣka udakāḥ api
gaṅgā aṃbhasā punar pūrṇāḥ catvāraḥ mbudhayaḥ bhavan
pūrvamāṇe samudre tu sāgaraiḥ parivarddhite
antarhitāḥ abhavan deśāḥ bahavaḥ tad samīpa gāḥ
samudra upānta varttīni kṣetrāṇi ca samantataḥ
itas tatas prayātāḥ ca janāḥ tad nilayāḥ nṛpa

original: gokarṇamiti ca kṣetraṃ pūrvaṃ proktaṃ tu yattava /
analyzed: gokarṇam iti ca kṣetram pūrvam proktam tu yat tava
armava upātta vartti tvāt samudre tā ṛddhim āgamat
tatas tad nilayāḥ sarve tad uddhāra abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
sahya adreḥ bhṛguśārdūlam draṣṭu kāmāḥ yayuḥ nṛpa

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamābhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde gaṅgānayanaṃ nāma ṣaṭpañcaśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamā bhāge tṛtīye upoddhāta pāde gaṅgānayanam nāma ṣaṭpañcaśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
jaiminiḥ uvāca
tatas śuṣka sumitra ādyāḥ munayaḥ śaṃsita vratāḥ
yayuḥ didṛkṣavaḥ rāmam mahā indram acalam prati
atītya su bahūn deśān vanāni saritaḥ tathā
āseduḥ acala śreṣṭham krameṇa muni puṅgavāḥ
tam āruhya śanais tasya khyātam āśrama maṇḍalam
praśānta krūra sattva āḍhyam śubham madhye tapaḥ vanam
sarva ṛttu phala puṣpa āḍhya taru khaṇḍa manoharam
snigdha chāyam anaupamyam sva āmodi sukha mārutam
tam tad āśramam āsādya brahmaghoṣeṇa nāditam
viviśuḥ tdṛṣṭa manasaḥ yathā vṛddha purassaram
brahmāsane sukha āsīnam mṛdu kṛṣṇa ajina uttare

original: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śāntaṃ dadṛśuste tapodhanāḥ // BndP_2,57.6 //
analyzed: śiṣyaiḥ parivṛtam śāntam dadṛśuḥ te tapodhanāḥ
kālāgnim iva lokān trīn dagdhvā pūrvam nija icchayā
tad doṣa śāntyai tapasi pravṛttam iva dehinam
te sametya bhṛgu śreṣṭham vinaya ācāra śālinaḥ
vavandire mahā maunam bhakti praṇata kandharāḥ
tatas tān āgatān dṛṣṭvā munīn bhṛgukulodvahaḥ
arghapādya ādibhiḥ samyak pūjayāmāsa sādaram
tān āsīnān kṛta ātithyān ṛṣīn deśa antara āgatān
uvāca bhṛgu śārdūlaḥ smita pūrvam idam vacaḥ

original: svāgataṃ vo mahābhāgā yūyaṃ sarve samāgatāḥ /
analyzed: svāgatam vaḥ mahābhāgāḥ yūyam sarve samāgatāḥ
karaṇīyam kim asmābhiḥ vadadhvam avicāritam
tatas te munayaḥ rāmam praṇamya idam atha abruvan
avehi asmān muni śreṣṭha gokarṇa nilayāt munīn
khanadbhiḥ sāgaraiḥ bhūmim kasmiṃścid kāraṇa antare
sa tīrtham tat mahā kṣetram patitam sāgara aṃbhasi
utsārita ārmava jalam kṣetram tat sarva pāvanam
upalabdhum abhīpsāmaḥ bhavataḥ tu na saṃśayaḥ
viṣṇoḥ aṃśena saṃjātaḥ bhavān bhṛgu kule kila

original: tasmātkartumaśakyaṃ te trailokye 'pi na kiñcana // BndP_2,57.15 //
analyzed: tasmāt kartum aśakyam te trailokye na kiñcana
vāñchita artha pradaḥ loke tvam eva iti anuśuśruma
vayam tvām āgatāḥ sarve rāma etat abhiyācitum
sa tvam ātma prabhāveṇa kṣetra pravaram adya tat
dātum arhasi vipra indra samutsārya ārmava udakam
rāmaḥ uvāca
etat sarvam aśeṣaṇa viditam me tapodhanāḥ

original: karaṇīyaṃ ca vaḥ kṛtyaṃ mayā nātra vicāraṇā // BndP_2,57.18 //
analyzed: karaṇīyam ca vaḥ kṛtyam mayā na atra vicāraṇā

original: kiṃ tu yuṣmadabhipretaṃ karma loke sudāruṇam /
analyzed: kim tu yuṣmad abhipretam karma loke su dāruṇam
śastra saṃgrahaṇāt śakyam mayā api na tat anyathā
datta sarva abhayaḥ ham vai nyasta śastraḥ śama anvitaḥ

original: tapaḥ samāsthitaścartu prāgeva pitṛ śāsanāt // BndP_2,57.20 //
analyzed: tapaḥ samāsthitaḥ cartu prāk eva pitṛ śāsanāt
na jātu śastra grahaṇam kariṣyāmi iti aham purā

original: pratiśrutya satāṃ madhye tapaḥ karttumihānaghāḥ // BndP_2,57.21 //
analyzed: pratiśrutya satām madhye tapaḥ karttum iha anaghāḥ
śastra grahaṇa sādhya tvāt yuṣmad īpsita vastunaḥ

original: kiṅkarttavyaṃ mayātreti mama ḍolāyate manaḥ // BndP_2,57.22 //
analyzed: kiṅkarttavyam mayā atrā iti mama ḍolāyate manaḥ
śuṣkaḥ upāca
satām saṃrakṣaṇa arthāya śastra saṃgrahaṇam tu yat
tat na cyāvayate satyat yathā uktam brahmaṇā purā
tasmāt asmad hita arthāya bhavatā grāhyam āyudham

original: dharma eva mahāṃstena caritaste bhaviṣyati // BndP_2,57.24 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ eva mahān tena caritaḥ te bhaviṣyati
jaiminiḥ uvāca
evam saṃprārthyamānaḥ tu munibhiḥ bhṛgu puṅgavaḥ
tam anudrutya medhāvī dharmam uddiśya kevalam

original: sa taiḥ saha muniśreṣṭho diśaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimām /
analyzed: sa taiḥ saha muni śreṣṭhaḥ diśam dakṣiṇa paścimām
samuddiśya cacau rājan draṣṭu kāmaḥ saritpatim
sa sahyam acala śreṣṭham avatīrya bhṛgu udvahaḥ

original: tatparaṃ saritāṃ patyustīraṃ prāpa mahāmanāḥ // BndP_2,57.27 //
analyzed: tad param saritām patyuḥ tīram prāpa mahāmanāḥ
sa dadarśa mahābhāgaḥ paritas māruta ākulam
ākaram sarva ratnānām pūryamāṇam anāratam
a parijñeya gāṃbhīryam mahā tām iva mānasam
duṣpāra pāram sarvasya vividha graha saṃhatim
a pradhṛṣya tamam loke dhātāram iva kevalam
ātmānam iva ca ātma tve nyakkṛta akhilam uddhatam
āśrayam sarva sattvānām āpagānām ca pārthivaḥ
atyartha capala uttuga taraṅga śata mālinam
upānta upala saṃghāta kuhara antara saṃśrayāt
viśīryamāṇa laharī śata phena ogha sobhitam
gaṃbhīra ghoṣam jaladhim paśyan muni gaṇaiḥ saha
saṃsevyamānaḥ taralaiḥ laharī kaṇa śītalaiḥ
muhūrttam iva rāja indra tīrenada nadīpateḥ
viśaśrame mahā bāhuḥ draṣṭu kāmaḥ pracetasam
tatas rāmaḥ samutthāya dakṣiṇa abhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ
megha gaṃbhirayā vācā varuṇam vākyam abravīt
aham muni gaṇaiḥ sārddham āgataḥ tvad didṛkṣayā
tasmāt sva rūpa dhṛk mahyam pracetaḥ dehi darśanam

original: iti śrutvāpi tadvākyaṃ varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ /
analyzed: iti śrutvā api tad vākyam varuṇaḥ yādasām patiḥ
na cacāla nija sthānāt nṛpa dhīrataraḥ tu ayam
punar punar ca rāmeṇa samāhūtaḥ u pi toyarāj

original: na dadau darśanaṃ tasmai prativācyaṃ ca nābhyadhāt // BndP_2,57.38 //
analyzed: na dadau darśanam tasmai prativācyam ca nā abhyadhāt
a laṅghanīyam tat vākyam varuṇena avadhīritam
atyantam iti kārya arthī viduṣā samupekṣitam
tatas pracetasā vākyam manyamānaḥ vadhīritam

original: cukopa tamabhiprekṣya rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // BndP_2,57.40 //
analyzed: cukopa tam abhiprekṣya rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām varaḥ
saṃkṣubdha sāgara ākāraḥ sa tadā sva bala āśrayāt
nistoyam arṇavam kartum iyeṣa ruṣitaḥ bhṛśam
tatas jalam upaspṛśya samīpe vijayam dhanuḥ

original: tataḥ praṇamya manasā śarvaṃ rāmo mahāddhanuḥ // BndP_2,57.42 //
analyzed: tatas praṇamya manasā śarvam rāmaḥ mahā ddhanuḥ
gṛhītvā āropayāmāsa krodha saṃrakta locanaḥ
abhimṛśya dhanuḥ śreṣṭham sa guṇam bhṛgu sattamaḥ
paśyatām sarva bhūtānām jyā ghoṣam akarot tadā
jyā ghoṣaḥ śuśruve tasya divispṛś ati niṣṭhuraḥ
cacāla nikhila ayena sapta dvīpa ārmavā mahī
tatas sa rabhasam rāmaḥ cāpe kāla anala upamam
su varma puṅkham viśikham saṃdadhe śara sattamam
tasmin astram mahā ghoram bhārgavam vahni daivatam
yuyoja bhṛgu śārdūlaḥ sa mantra abhyāsa mokṣaṇam
tatas cacāla vasudhā sa śaila vana kānanā
prakṣobham paramam jagmuḥ deva asura mahā uragāḥ
saṃdhita astram bhṛgu śreṣṭham krodha saṃrakta locanam
dṛṣṭvā saṃbhrānta manasaḥ babhūvuḥ sa carācarāḥ
sa digdāha bhra paṭalaiḥ abhavan saṃvṛtāḥ diśaḥ
vavuḥ ca paruṣāḥ vātāḥ rajaḥ vyāptāḥ mahā ravāḥ
manda raśmiḥ aśītāṃśuḥ abhūta saṃrakta maṇḍalaḥ
sa ulkā pāta aśaniḥ vṛṣṭiḥ babhūva rudhira udakā
kim etat iti saṃbhrāntā dhūma udgāra ati bhīṣaṇam
adhiropita divya astram pracakarṣa mahā śaram
dhanuḥ vikarṣamāṇam tam sphurat jvālā agra sāyakam
dadṛśuḥ munayaḥ rāmam kalpa anta anala sannibham
ākarṇa ākṛṣṭa kodaṇḍa maṇḍalābhyam tara sthitam
tasya pratibhaya ākāram duṣprāpam abhavat vapuḥ
vikṛṣṭa dhanuṣaḥ tasya rūpam ugram raveḥ iva
kalpa ante bhyuditasya iva maṇḍalam pariveṣitam
kalpa anta agna sama jvālā bhīṣaṇam sphurataḥ vapuḥ
tasya alakṣyata cakramya hareḥ iva ca maṇḍalam
sphurat krodha anala jvālā parītasya ati raudra tām
avāpa viṣṇoḥ sa tadā narasiṃha ākṛteḥ iva
vapuḥ vikṛṣṭa cāpasya bhṛkuṭī kuṭila ānanam
rāmasya abhūt bhavasya iva didhakṣoḥ tripuram purā

original: jājvalyamānavapuṣaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā bhayāt // BndP_2,57.58 //
analyzed: jājvalyamāna vapuṣam tam dṛṣṭvā sahasā bhayāt
prasīda jaya rāma iti tuṣṭuvuḥ munayaḥ khilāḥ
tatas strā agni sphurat dhūma paṭalaiḥ śakalīkṛtam
babhūva channam aṃbhodheḥ antar puram a śaiṣataḥ
jvalat astra anala jvālā pa ritāpa parāhataḥ
atyaricyata saṃbhrānta salila oghaḥ udanvataḥ
timiṅgila timi grāha nakra matsya ahikacchapāḥ
prajagmuḥ paramām ārttim prāṇinaḥ salileśayāḥ
utpatat nipatat tāmyat nānā sattva uddhata ūrmibhiḥ
prakṣobham bhṛśam aṃbhodhiḥ sahasā samupāgamat

original: trāsarāsaṃ ca vipulamaṃbhasā plavatā saha // BndP_2,57.63 //
analyzed: trāsa rāsam ca vipulam aṃbhasā plavatā saha
udvelatām itas taptāḥ salila antara cāriṇaḥ
tatas tasmāt śarāt jvālāḥ phūtkṛta aśeṣa bhīṣaṇāḥ
nirūpitam iva vyaktam niśceruḥ sarvatas diśam
tatas pracaṇḍa pavanaiḥ sarvatas parivarttitam
agni jvālā mayam rakta vitāna ābham alakṣyata
pralaya abdheḥ iva atyartham astra agni vyākula aṃbhasaḥ
samudrikta tayā tasya taraṅgāḥ tīram abhyayus
astra agni viddha ākulita jala ghoṣeṇa bhūyasā
kakubhaḥ badhirīkuvan alakṣyata payonidhiḥ
strā anala jvālā parivīta jala āvilaḥ
jagāma paramām ārttim sahyaḥ sadyas tad āśrayaḥ
ākarṇa ākṛṣṭa kodaṇḍam dṛṣṭvā rāmam payonidhiḥ
viṣādam agamat tīvram yamam dṛṣṭvā iva pātakī
bhaya kaṃpita sarva aṅgaḥ tatas nadanadīpatiḥ
vihāya sahajam dhairyam bhīru tvam samupāgamat
tatas sva rūpam āsthāya sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
uttīryamāṇaḥ sva jalam varuṇaḥ pratyadṛśyata
kṛtāñjaliḥ sārvahastaḥ pracetāḥ bhārgava antikam
tvarayā abhyāyāyau śīghra sāyakāt bhīta bhīta vat
abhyetya ākṛṣṭa dhanuṣaḥ sa tasya caraṇa abjayoḥ
abravīt ca bhṛśam bhītaḥ saṃbhrama ākulita akṣaram

original: yathā yaṣṭā yathā dātā tathā svarge mahīpate // BndP_2,69.57 //
analyzed: yathā yaṣṭā yathā dātā tathā svarge mahīpate

original: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahopurāṇe vāyuprokte madhyamabhāge tṛtīya upoddhātapāde bhārgavacarite kārttavīryasaṃbhavo nāma ekonasaptatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahopurāṇe vāyu prokte madhyama bhāge tṛtīye upoddhāta pāde bhārgavacarite kārttavīryasaṃbhavaḥ nāma ekonasaptatitamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ
kimartham tu vanam dagdham āpavasya mahātmanaḥ

original: kārttavīryeṇa vikramya tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // BndP_2,70.1 //
analyzed: kārttavīryeṇa vikramya tat naḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām

original: rakṣitā satu rājarṣiḥ prajānāmiti naḥ śrutam /
analyzed: rakṣitā satu rājarṣiḥ prajānām iti naḥ śrutam

original: kathaṃ sarakṣitā bhūtvā nāśayeta tapovanam // BndP_2,70.2 //
analyzed: katham sa rakṣitā bhūtvā nāśayeta tapaḥ vanam
verses
sūtaḥ uvāca

original: teṣāṃ hi sargāścatvāraḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ vistareṇa vai // BndP_2,71.2 //
analyzed: teṣām hi sargāḥ catvāraḥ śṛṇudhvam vistareṇa vai

original: sṛṃja yasya sute dve tu bāhyake te udāvahat // BndP_2,71.3 //
analyzed: sṛṃja yasya sute dve tu bāhyake te udāvahat

original: tasya bhārye bhaginyau te prasūte tu sutānbahūn /
analyzed: tasya bhārye bhaginyau te prasūte tu sutān bahūn

original: nimlociḥ kiṅkaṇaścaiva dhṛṣṭiḥ para purañjayaḥ // BndP_2,71.4 //
analyzed: nimlociḥ kiṅkaṇaḥ ca eva dhṛṣṭiḥ purañjayaḥ
te sṛṃjayyā bhajamānāt vijajñire

original: teṣāṃ devāvṛdho rājā cacāra paramaṃ tapaḥ /

original: putraḥ sarvaguṇopeto mama bhūyāditi sma ha // BndP_2,71.6 //
analyzed: putraḥ sarva guṇa upetaḥ mama bhūyāt iti sma ha

kalyāṇa tvāt narapateḥ tasya sā nimnagā uttamā

original: nābhigacchāmi tāṃ nārīṃ yasyāmevaṃvidhaḥ sutaḥ // BndP_2,71.9 //
analyzed: na abhigacchāmi tām nārīm yasyām evaṃvidhaḥ sutaḥ

original: tasmādasya svayaṃ cāhaṃ bhavāmyadya sahavratā // BndP_2,71.10 //

original: jajñe tasyāḥ svayaṃ hṛtstho bhāvastasya yatheritaḥ /
analyzed: jajñe tasyāḥ svayam hṛd sthaḥ bhāvaḥ tasya yathā īritaḥ

original: atha bhūtvā kumārī tu sā cintāparameva ca // BndP_2,71.11 //
analyzed: atha bhūtvā kumārī tu sā cintā param eva ca

original: atha sā navame māsi suṣuve saritā varā /
analyzed: atha sā navame māsi suṣuve saritā varā

original: tatra vaṃśe purāṇajñā gāthāṃ gāyanti vai dvijāḥ /
analyzed: tatra vaṃśe purāṇa jñāḥ gāthām gāyanti vai dvijāḥ
guṇān devāvṛdhasya api kīrtayantaḥ mahātmanaḥ

original: babhruḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṃ devairdevāvṛthaḥ samaḥ // BndP_2,71.15 //
analyzed: babhruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ manuṣyāṇām devaiḥ devāvṛthaḥ samaḥ

ye mṛta tvam anuprāptāḥ babroḥ devāvṛdhāt api
yajvā dānapatiḥ dhīraḥ brahmaṇyaḥ satya vāc budhaḥ
kīrttimān ca mahā bhojaḥ sāttvatānām mahā rathaḥ
tasya anvavāyaḥ su mahān bhojāḥ ye bhuvi viśrutāḥ

original: gāndhārī caiva mādrī ca dhṛṣṭairbhārye babhūvatuḥ // BndP_2,71.18 //

original: sādrī yudhājitaṃ putraṃ tato mīḍhvāṃsameva ca // BndP_2,71.19 //
analyzed: sādrī yudhājitam putram tatas mīḍhvāṃsam eva ca
anamitram śinam ca eva tau ubhau puruṣa uttamau

original: anamitrasuto nighno nighnasya dvau babhūvatuḥ // BndP_2,71.20 //

original: tasya satrājitaḥ sūryaḥ sakhā prāṇasamo 'bhavat // BndP_2,71.21 //

toyam kūlāt samuddhartum upasthātum yayau ravim

original: yathaiva vyomni paśyāmi tvāmahaṃ jyotiṣāṃ pate // BndP_2,71.24 //
analyzed: yathā eva vyomni paśyāmi tvām aham jyotiṣām pate

original: ko viśeṣo vivasvaṃste sakhyenopagatasya vai // BndP_2,71.25 //

etat śrutvā sa bhagavān maṇi ratnam syamantakam

original: prītimānatha taṃ dṛṣṭvā muhūrttaṃ kṛtavānkathām // BndP_2,71.27 //
analyzed: prītimān atha tam dṛṣṭvā muhūrttam kṛtavān kathām

original: provācāgnisavarṇaṃ tvāṃ yena lokaḥ prapaśyati // BndP_2,71.28 //

original: syamaṃ takaṃ nāmamaṇiṃ dattavāṃstasya bhāskaraḥ // BndP_2,71.29 //

original: kāmavarṣī ca parjanyo na ca vyādhibhayaṃ tathā // BndP_2,71.32 //
analyzed: kāma varṣī ca parjanyaḥ na ca vyādhi bhayam tathā

tat karma kṛṣṇasya tatas vṛṣṇi andhaka mahattarāḥ

original: padbhyāṃ gatvā hariṣyāmi maṇiratnaṃ syamantakam // BndP_2,71.75 //

original: mithilopavane taṃ vai jaghāna paramāstravit // BndP_2,71.76 //

original: kṛtyaṃ na me dvārakayā na tvayā na ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ // BndP_2,71.79 //
analyzed: kṛtyam na me dvārakayā na tvayā na ca vṛṣṇibhiḥ

original: ānīto dvārakāmeva kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā // BndP_2,71.85 //
analyzed: ānītaḥ dvārakām eva kṛṣṇena ca mahātmanā
